1 YEHOVA
Lijina lyaKalunga ikiye Yehova, kaha lyalumbununa ngwavo “Eji Kulingisanga Vyuma Kupwako.” Yehova apwa Kalunga wangolo josena uze atengele vyuma vyosena. Atwama nangolo jakulinga vyeshovyo nasake.
Lijina lyaKalunga valisonekele muvasona vachiHepeleu vawana. MuChingeleshi, ava vasona vavasoneka ngwavo YHWH chipwe JHVH. Lijina lyaKalunga lyasoloka kafwe mapapa 7,000 muVisoneka vyachiHepeleu vyakulivanga. Vatu veji kuvulukanga lijina lyakwamba ngwavo Yehova mujijila jakulisezaseza kweseka 
... (8289 chars skipped) ... 
o.”—Kuputuka 1:20, 24.
Kuyoya chamutu chipwe chakanyama. Yehova alwezele Mose ngwenyi: “Vatu vosena vaze vapwile nakusaka kukujiha [“vapwile nakutondatonda mwono wove,” kwinyikila chamwishi] vanafu lyehi.” (Kulovoka 4:19) Omu Yesu apwile hano hamavu, ambile ngwenyi: “Ami yami kafunga wamwenemwene. Kafunga wamwenemwene eji kwechanga mwono wenyi hali mikoko jenyi.”—Yowano 10:11.
Kaha nawa nge mutu mwalinga chuma ‘namwono wenyi wosena,’ chili nakulumbununa nge nalisuula kulinga chuma kana kaha nawa
... (8289 chars skipped) ...
gamisanga vana vavo mujila yize nayivakafwa vatachikize ovyo vatela kupwila vakwononoka. Vatela nawa kuvanangula vazange Yehova naMazu enyi Mbimbiliya nakuvakafwa vatachikize jindongi jatwamamo.
31 VANDEMONE
Vapwa vangelo vakuhuka vaze katwamona namesoko vaze vakwechi ngolo jakulipwila. Vangelo kana valikangile kuli Kalunga, ngocho vapwile jino vaka-kole jenyi. (Kuputuka 6:2; WaYuta 6) Vakundwijile Satana nakufumbukila Yehova.—Lushimbi lwamuchivali 32:17; Luka 8:30; Vilinga 16:16; WaYakova 2:19.

Ha 27 Outubro 2023, katuhele utayizo wa kutunga mazuwo aha a Mbetele mu mbonge ya Fishkill, Nova York, EUA. Utayizo wacho uze tunakatambula kuli akwa-kukwata chiyulo cha kuteta yipatulo ya mbonge, (Conselho de Planejamento Municipal) chinalumbunuka ngwo chishina cha ukwaso cha Yela ja Yehova mahasa kuputuka kuchitunga.
Mbetele ya Fishkill yili ha 64 quilômetro ndo haze hali Chishina Chinene cha Yela ja Yehova mu Warwick, Nova York, EUA. Mandumbu a malunga ni a mapwo waze atwama mu Fishkill kakuk
... (135 chars skipped) ... 
sali likwo lia tapalo kuze kuli mazuwo akwo a Mbetele. Chishina chino cha ukwaso muchipwa ni prédio yimuwika ya ma escritórios ya 4.366 metros quadrados, yipatulo yaali ya kwilu ni ya mwishi, prédio yimuwika ya manutenção ya 1.393 metros quadrados ni prédio yimuwika ya kuhehela ya 1.393 metros quadrados. Chikwo nawa, kanalulieka yihela ya haze ya kuhehela. Tunalihulikila kanawa ha mulimo uno hanga upwe upema chinji.
Milimo yinji ya kutunga makayilinga kuli akwa-mayipreza, alioze mayisongwela kul
... (135 chars skipped) ...
ill, wakukalakala mu escritório ya ukwaso yamba ngwenyi: “Ndo haliapwila Mbetele ya Fishkill yili wika ni mazuwo a kutwama, kumwakapwile yihela ya kuhehela. Alioze hanyima lia kutunga chihela chino, mutupwa ni chihela cha kulikungulwila ni kukalakala hamuwika. Tunazange chinji kumona kuhwa cha chishina chino cha ukwaso!”
Tunawahilila chinji ni mutambi wa mulimo uno wa kutunga uze mununga chinji mandumbu waze akalakala ku Mbetele ya Fishkill. Tunalembe hanga Yehova awahise mulimo uno.—Samu 127:1.

Vyuma muka vili nakusoloka makumbi ano vize vahanjikile chimweza muMbimbiliya?
Mazu aKalunga ahanjika ika hachiyoyelo chavatu ‘mumakumbi akukuminyina’?
Vyuma muka vyamwaza yahanjika Mbimbiliya kutalisa ‘kumakumbi akukuminyina’?
WEVWILILAHO lyehi kumijimbu yayipi hachisaji chipwe hatelevijini nakushinganyeka ngwove, ‘Uno kano kaye kanatale kulihi’ nyi? Vyuma vyavipi vyeji kusolokanga mujila yakukasumuna kaha, ngocho kakweshi mutu mwahasa kuhumikiza vyuma navikasoloka hameneko. (WaYakova 4:14) Olo
... (6006 chars skipped) ... 
i navakachihamika
11 Uno omu mukiko vapwa vatu vamungalila yove tahi? Eyo mukiko. Kaye kosena kanazale navatu vakwechi vilinga vyavipi. Echi chili nakusolola nge kalinwomu Kalunga avanongese, mwomwo naMbimbiliya yamba ngwayo: “Omu navasoka vaka-kuhuka nge mwila, omu navafukila vaka-kuzata mwakuhenga vosena, navalinga mangana vakavanongese haya myaka yosena.”—Samu 92:7.
VYUMA VYAMWAZA VIZE VILI NAKUSOLOKA!
12 Myaka yino yakukuminyina yinazale to navihuli nganomu yambile chimweza Mbimbiliya. Oloze
... (6006 chars skipped) ...
kuma” nachikalumbununa ika kuli vaze veji kwimanyinanga Yehova nakole nakuli vaze veji kwononokanga kuchiyulo chaWangana waKalunga?
16. Vyuma muka vyamwaza watela kulinga?
17. Mwomwo ika kwenyeka vatu vakuhuka nachikeza mukukasumuna kuvatu vavavulu?
18. Mazu muka ahuhumwine Yesu aze twatela kulama?
LINANGULE VIKWAVO
Lombenu Vaminangule Mbimbiliya Hawana Wakanyombo
Mbimbiliya yinakukumbulula vihula vyavilemu vyavatu vavavulu mukaye. Kutala nayenu namusaka mbimbiliya yikumbulule vihula vyenu tahi?

UNO mazu ahali Samu 83:18 vawasoneka ngachilihi muMbimbiliya yove? Mbimbiliya yaNew World Translation of the Holy Scriptures yasoneka vesi kaneyi ngwayo: “Mangana vakatachikize ngwavo, Ove ukwechi lijina lyove yove Yehova Uka wove uMuka-kulitulaho helu lyamavu hosena.” NajiMbimbiliya jikwavo jalumuna vesi kaneyi mujila yoyimwe. Oloze mujiMbimbiliya jeka jajivulu, lijina Yehova valifumisamo nakushishisamo jivulukiso jakufwana nge “Mwata” chipwe “waMyaka Yosena.” Uno lijina muka vatela kuzachisa m
... (2261 chars skipped) ... 
a vahone kusoneka lijina lyaKalunga shina chisemwa chavaYuleya. VaYuleya vavavulu vetavila ngwavo chapwa chijila kuvuluka lijina lyaKalunga. Vishinganyeka kanevi vyapendamina halushimbi lwamuMbimbiliya vazachisa mwakuhenga luze lwakwamba ngwavo: “Kanda mukavuluka lijina lyaYehova Kalunga kenu hamakuliko, mwomwo Yehova keshi kukasambisou mwavuluka lijina lyenyi hamakuliko.”—Kulovoka 20:7.
Olu lushimbi lwakanyisa kuzachisa lijina lyaKalunga mujila yakuhenga. Uno kutala lwakanyisa kuzachisa lijina 
... (2261 chars skipped) ...
a kutachikiza lijina lyaYehova kavejiva vilinga kanevi vyamwaza nganako.
Enga, lijina lyaYehova lyatela kupwamo muMbimbiliya. Kwijiva mulyalumbunukila nakulizachisa kanawa hakumulemesa nachitulingisa tupandame chikuma kuli Setu wamwilu, Yehova.*
* Tala mbuloshuwa yakwamba ngwavo Lijina Lyaukalunga Lize Nalikelilanga Haya Myaka Yosena, vasoneka kuli Vinjiho jaYehova, mangana uwane mijimbu yikwavo yahanjika halijina lyaKalunga, nomwo lyalumbunukila, novyo twatela kulizachishila hakulemesa Kalunga.

Eyo. Twafwelela muli Yesu uze ambile ngwenyi: “Ami yami jila, yami muchano, yami kuyoya. Mutu naumwe wauchi mweza kuli Tata kuvanga ahichile muli ami.” (Yowano 14:6)
Twafwelela ngwetu Yesu afumine mwilu nakwiza hano hamavu nakuhana ndando yakusokola vatu vosena. (Mateu 20:28) Kufwa chenyi nakusanguka chalingisa vatu vaze navafwelela muli ikiye vakawane kuyoya chamyaka yosena. (Yowano 3:16) Twafwelela nawa ngwetu Yesu ali jino Mwangana waWangana waKalunga mwilu, uze kalinwaha unehe kuunda hano hamavu hosena. (Kusoloka 11:15) Kaha twetavila mazu aYesu aze ahanjikile ngwenyi: “Tata anguhambakana ami.” (Yowano 14:28)
Shikaho katwalemesa Yesuko mwomwo kapwa Kalunga Ukwechi Ngolo Josenako.

Mumu liaka miaso yapwile yilemu chinji kuli A-Izalele?
MIASO yapwile yilemu chinji mu Izalele ya ku shakulu. Mbimbiliya yakuhanjika ha yisuho yinji hali atu waze te akwimba yisaji yeka ni yeka hanji kwimba lume ni liji. Chihanda chinene cha mu Mbimbiliya chili cha kusoneka ni miaso. Ngwe chilweza tuli ni mukanda wa Masamu, Mwaso wa Solomone, ni Lungungu wa Jeremia. Umwe mukanda wa kuhanjika hakutwala ku mwono wa ku mashimbu a kunyima, unambe ngwo: Mbimbiliya yakusolola ngwo, “A-Izalele te kakwim
... (632 chars skipped) ... 
le lume akwa-kwimba miaso.”
Miaso ku zuwo lia mwanangana. Mianangana a mu Izalele no te kakuzanga kwimba miaso. Ngwe chilweza, Mwanangana Saulu, kanehene Ndawichi ku zuwo lia wanangana hanga amwimbile kalialia. (1 Samue. 16:18, 23) Ha kupalika cha amwe mashimbu, muze Ndawichi apwile Mwanangana yalinga yikwata ya kwimba nayo, yasoneka miaso ni kululieka chizavu cha akwa-kwimba waze apwile ni kwimbila Yehova mu tembele. (2 Sango 7:6; Amo. 6:5) Mwanangana Solomone kapwile ni akwa-kwimba a malunga n
... (632 chars skipped) ...
ele kembile Samu ya Halel a hanji ngwetu, mwaso wa kuhalisa nawo Yehova ha mashimbu a Chizomboka.
Kuli atu ja Zambi, miaso muyichinunga ni kupwa ni ulemu ndo musono. (Tia. 5:13) Kwimba chakulinga chihanda ku uwayilo wetu. (Efwe. 5:19) Chikwo nawa, twakulivwa hakamwihi ni mandumbu jetu muze twakwimbila Yehova hamuwika. (Kolo. 3:16) Miaso yakutukwasa muze tunapalika mu yuma yikalu ku mwono. (Yili. 16:25) Pundu lume, kwimba miaso chili jila yipema ya kusolwelamo ufulielo ni zango lietu kuli Yehova.

Muloñadi awa antu chinazañaleluwu? Muloña anakupompa kupompa kwetu kweneni. Kufwana ambuña Nzambi akushankulu, alejeluwu nawu apompeña kapampa kasatu hachaaka, anetu nawa twatalilaña mpinji yakupompa kupompa kwamaneni. (Kuhituluka 16:16) Chaaka nichaaka twapompaña kupompa kusatu: twapompaña kayedi kupompa kwañinza kwefuku dimu, niKupompa Kweluña kwamafuku asatu. Twahetelañamu ñahi muniku kupompa?
Kwatukoleshaña hamu nawana kwetu akwaKristu. A Isarela azañaleleña hakumuhameka Yehova ‘hakupompa,’ 
... (165 chars skipped) ... 
eñi hela akumatuña acheñi. Hachayili, twadiilaña yakudya hamu heluña dakupompela, chumichi chaleñelaña kudiluñisha chikupu haniyi mpinji yachawija chakuspiritu. (Yililu 2:42) Haniku kupompa kwamaneni twamonaña namesu kukeña kwatunuñañeshaña ‘nawa mana kwetu ejima’ mukaayi.—1 Petulu 2:17.
Kwatukwashaña kuyilaku hambidi kuspiritu. A Isarela ahetelelumu cheñi “chayilumbulukilili mazu” amuNsona ayilubulwililuwu. (Nehemiya 8:8, 12) Anetu nawa twalemesha nshimbi jamuBayibolu jatulejañawu hakupompa kwe
... (165 chars skipped) ...
a yamwekeni. Twakoleshewaña neyi tutiya yuma yahitañamu ana kwetu anakuumika kukala kwamonañawu muchihandilu hakwikala akwaKristu munanu mafuku akala. Hakupompa kweluña, chimwenu cheneni chatukwashaña kumona nsañu yamuBayibolu neyi yinakumwekana makonu nawa yatudizishaña yuma yayiwahi. Hakupompa kwamaneni kwejima, apapatishaña antu akeñaña kumwekesha nawu anadihani kudi Nzambi.
Muloñadi mpinji yakupompa kupompa kwamaneni chiyatuzañaleshaña?
Munateli kuhetelamu ñahi neyi muya kukupompa kwamaneni?

Alex ali nakulishimwoka hakushinganyeka kuzundula chikasha chikwavo nakuchihaka muminyau yakapani azachila yize yeji kumbatanga viteli vyavatu vali nakwaluka. Ali nakulihulisa ngwenyi, ‘Ikaze ngunakakachila kukapani kaneyi. Likumbi muka nangukafukila? Kachi kangwazatako, kachi ngweji kulivwisanga kuwaha kuyoya.’
Vatu vavavulu makumbi ano kavasaka kuzata nangoloko, nge omu tunamono muchakutalilaho chaAlex. Aaron uze apwa muka-kuwahisa jiminyau ambile ngwenyi: “Vatu vavavulu vashinganyeka nge kava
... (379 chars skipped) ... 
 vyuma ambile ngwenyi: “Vatu vashinganyeka ngwavo, kachi nge mutu mwazata nangolo awane mwakuyoyela, kaha keshi kufukilako.” Shane uze azata milimo yakukombakomba nayikiye amona ngwenyi omu mukiko vashinganyeka vatu. Ambile ngwenyi: “Vatu makumbi ano vali nakusaka kuzata kaha chindende, oloze vasaka kutambula jimbongo jajivulu.”
Tuyokutuyoku, vatu vavavulu vaze vafukila vasaka kuzata nangolo. Daniel wamyaka yakusemuka 25 uze azata milimo yakutunga jizuvo ambile ngwenyi, “Ngwamona nge kuzata nang
... (379 chars skipped) ...
Andre valivwisenga kuwaha kuzata nangolo? Vanakavangizanga jindongi jamuMbimbiliya mukuyoya chavo. Mbimbiliya kayakanyisa vatu kuzata nangoloko, oloze yavakolezeza vazatenga nangolo nakupwa nalukakachila. Chipwe ngocho, Mbimbiliya kayatulweza kaha tuzate milimoko, oloze yatulweza nawa omu tunahase kulivwisa kuwaha kuzata milimo yetu.
Jindongi muka jamuMbimbiliya najimikafwa musuuluke namilimo muli nakuzata? Tuli nakumilomba mukekese jindongi jimwe jize vanashimutwila muchihande chinakavangizaho.

ENOKI washakamini yaaka yayivulu. Chinateli kutukalila kufwikija yaaka yashakaminiyi iwu muntu, yaaka yakushika ku 365, kubadika yaaka yashakamañawu antu makonu, yinateli kwiñilamu kapampa kawana! Kwesekeja nachashakamineñawu antu hayina mpinji haswejeli kukulaku. Kunyima kwakweni, antu ashakamineña yaaka yayivulu kubadika makonu. Adama, muntu watachi washakamini yaaka yakubadika ha 600, diyi mpinji yasemukiliyi Enoki nawa washakaminiku cheñi yaaka 300. Anyana kaAdama amakwawu ashakamini yaaka y
... (5614 chars skipped) ... 
sañu yindi muBayibolu. Tweluka iyi nsañu muloña Yuda manakwaYesu, amoneneni kusoneka hamazu awuprofwetu aEnoki ahosheliyi yaaka nkulakaji yayeni. *
Enoki waprofweteli nindidi? Waprofweteli nindi: “Tiyenu, Yehova wenjili namakumi amakombakaji awantu indi ajila, nakwila mudimu wakusompesha nakukonkolola ejima asekeshaña Nzambi, nanyidimu yawu yakusekesha Nzambi yakoñeluwu chakusekesha Nzambi, nayuma yakala yejima yamuhosheluwu akwanshidi asekeshaña Nzambi.” (Yuda 14, 15) Dichi, mwatela kwiluka nen
... (5614 chars skipped) ...
shimunaña nawu Yuda wasonekeli nsañu yakutwamba yafumishiliyi muMukanda waEnoki, chinakumwekesha nawu iwu mukanda hiwadiña waweniku, ilaña washimuna nsañu yakutwamba hadi Enoki. Iwu mukanda wukweti nsañu yalala yahosha hawuprofwetu waEnoki, hadaha ayifumishili kunsañu yayeni yasonekeliwu yitwabula kwiluka, chili yadiña yakusoneka hela yadiña nsañu yakuhosha hohu. Hadaha Yuda wazatishili iyi nsañu yasonekeliwu hela welukili iyi nsañu yaEnoki kudi Yesu wamweni chihandilu chaEnoki iku wudi mwiwulu.

Kalunga asaka tutwame mukuunda nakulivwisa kuwaha mupalachise hano hamavu haya myaka yosena.
Pamo munahase kulihulisa ngwenu, ‘Uno chuma kana chinahase kukasoloka ngachilihi?’ Mbimbiliya yamba ngwayo Wangana waKalunga ukiko naukaneha vyuma kana. Ngocho Kalunga ali nakusaka vatu vosena valinangule vyaWangana kana nakwijiva vyuma mwakatulingila.—Samu 37:11, 29; Isaya 9:7.
Kalunga asaka tunganyale.
Setu wamwilu asaka tulivwise kuwaha haya myaka yosena, ngana mwachisemi wamwaza uze asaka vana venyi vayoyenga kanawa. (Isaya 48:17, 18) Ashika ngwenyi wose “eji kulinganga mwaya muchima waKalunga mwatwamanga haya myaka yosena.”—WaYowano 1, 2:17.
Kalunga asaka tutambukenga mujijila jenyi.
Mbimbiliya yamba ngwayo Tengi yetu asaka ‘kutulweza jijila jenyi’ mangana ‘tutambukenga mujijila jenyi.’ (Isaya 2:2, 3) Alweza “vatu valijina lyenyi” vavilikenga mukaye kosena vyuma ajina.—Vilinga 15:14.
Kalunga asaka tupwenga vakulinunga hamwe hakumulemesa.
Muchishishisa chakuhandununa vatu, kulemesa chamwenemwene cheji kununganga vatu hamwe mwomwo yazangi yamuchano vatwama nayo. (Yowano 13:35) Veya makumbi ano vali nakunangula malunga namapwevo kwosena mangana valinunge nakulemesela Kalunga hamwe? Tunamilombo mutange mbuloshuwa yino nakuwana muvanakumbulwila chihula chino.

Kumbululo lia mu Mbimbiliya
Tunanyingika ngwetu, Mbimbiliya kuyishi kuzachisa liji “kuselumuna” hanga yihanjike ha nyonga kuzanga kuchiza ufumba. Alioze yisoneko yinji mu Mbimbiliya yakusolola nyonga lia Yehova hakutwala ku mwono wa mutu, chipwe wa mwana yoze uchili mu jimo.
Mwono uli chawana cha Zambi. (Uputukilo 9:6; Masamu 36:9) Mutu mweswawo mwono wenyi wapwa ulemu chinji kuli Zambi, chipwe wa mwana yoze uchili mu jimo. Kashika, kuchiza kushiha mwana yoze kanda achisemuka ku zango lia mutu m
... (721 chars skipped) ... 
 jimo ngwe wa yoze hasemuka.
Ni usongwelo wa Zambi, Mwanangana Ndawichi yamba kuli Zambi ngwenyi: “Meso je amwene mujimba wami shimbu kanda uliwumba.” (Samu 139:16) Zambi te kakumona Ndawichi ngwe mutu shimbu te kanda achisemuka.
Shimbu profeta Jeremia te kanda asemuka, Zambi te hanatese kumwaha chiteli chalipwila. Zambi yamba kuli Jeremia ngwenyi: “Shimbu kanda nguchikuwumba mu jimo nakunyingikine; shimbu kanda uchisemuka nakutumbikilile; nakusele ukapwe profeta ku mavungu.”—Jeremia 1:5.
Luka u
... (721 chars skipped) ...
Shina chili chipi kuchiza ufumba nyi mwono wa mwana hanji wa naye uli mu ponde?
Kulita ni yize Mbimbiliya yakwamba hakutwala ku mwono wa mwana yoze kanda achisemuka, chili chipi kushiha mwana wacho chipwe ngwe mwono wenyi hanji wa naye muupwa mu ponde.
Muchihasa kulingiwa ha mashimbu a kushita, mukusoloka umwe kapinda munene yoze mahasa kulingisa atu hanga asakule kulamwina mwono wa mwana hanji wa naye. Ha chikuma ngwe chino, atu waze anatale ha chuma chacho katamba kusakula mutu yoze malamwina.

Kulita ni kuhengwola chimwe chize alingile mu chizavu cha akwa-kutala ha yuma ya kulifunga ku misongo mu Estados Unidos, chinambe ngwo, unji wa akweze a miaka 15 ndo 19 hanalisumbakenya mukanwa. “Nyi muhula akweze hakutwala ku chikuma chacho, ayo mahasa kukulweza ngwo mulonga kuushiko.” Yino ye ambile Sharlene Azam yoze wasonekene mukanda unambe ngwo: Oral Sex Is the New Goodnight Kiss. (Kulisumbakenya mukanwa yili mbeju yaha ya ufuku) “Kuli ayo kulisumbakenya mukanwa hi kulisumbakenya ko chamwe
... (1084 chars skipped) ... 
—yeswe yinalumbunuka kulisumbakenya.
Mumu liaka watamba kunyingika chikuma chino?
Tutalenu yimwe yisoneko ya mu Mbimbiliya yinashindakenya chikuma chino.
Mbimbiliya yinambe ngwo: ‘Chino we upale wa Zambi we usandu wenu ngwetu, nukachine utanji.’—1 A-Tesalonika 4:3.
Mu limi lia Hepreu liji “utanji” lize alumbunwine hano, linatale ha kulikwata-kwata cheswe ku mujimba ni mutu yoze walimbachile nenyi, kuchingako kulipomba, kulisumbakenya mukanwa, mu uhambukilo, ni kupinya-pinya mutu mweka ku ulunga 
... (1084 chars skipped) ...

Yilayi yize twakuwana mu tapalo yakutukinda tuhone kwendesa ngwe chize yetu ene tunazange, alioze kuyikaula chakutukwasa kulifunga. Chimuwika nawa, ni shimbi ja Zambi nejo jakutukanjisa kulinga yuma yize twakuzanga, alioze nyi twajononokena mujitufunga ku mwono.

1. Mumu liaka Zambi alulikile a Izalele?
Zambi kanakalulika minyachi ya kalamba Apalahama hanga apwe vungu ni kwaha nawa shimbi. Iye yavuluka vungu liacho ngwo “Izalele” nawa yaha uwayilo wa umwenemwene ni shimbi jenyi hanga ajifunge. (Masamu 147:19, 20) Kashika atu akumavungu eswe te mayuka kuli a Izalele.—Tanga Uputukilo 22:18.
Zambi kanakasakula A-Izalele hanga apwe yela jenyi. Yishima yo yinasolola pundu chize atu apwile ni kuyuka muze te akwononokena Shimbi ja Zambi. (Shimbi Yamuchiali 4:6)
... (927 chars skipped) ... 
la ha chilulikiso chimuwika cha malongeso a mu Mbimbiliya mu yikungulwilo yo.—Tanga Hepreu 10:24, 25.
3. Kuchi ululikiso wa Yela ja Yehova unakaputuka ha matangwa wano?
Mu mwaka wa 1870 chimwe chizavu chikehe cha akwa kulilongesa Mbimbiliya ayo yaputuka kuwana umwenemwene wa Mbimbiliya uze te hiunatoka. Ayo yanyingika ngwo Yesu te hanalulieka chikungulwila cha akwa Kristu hanga ambujole sango jipema, ni ayo nawa yaputuka ni ululikiso wa kwambujola Wanangana wa Zambi hashi heswe. Mu mwaka wa 1931
... (927 chars skipped) ...
gwe apostolo, ni yetwe nawa twakwambujola sango jipema ku zuwo ni zuwo. (Yilinga 20:20) Nawa twakuhana malongeso a mu Mbimbiliya kuli atu waze ali ni zango ha umwenemwene. Yela ja Yehova hi ululikiso wika ko. Alioze yetwe eswe tuli asoko ja Tata wa zango. Yetwe eswe tuli mandumbu twakulifunga umwe ni mukwo. (2 A-Tesalonika 1:3) Chize kunyima atu ja Yehova kalilulieka hanga apemene kuli Zambi ni kukwasa akwo, ayo kali asoko waze ali ni uwahililo unji hano hashi.—Tanga Masamu 33:12; Yilinga 20:35.

Kumbululo lia mu Mbimbiliya
Ewa. Mutuhasa kuwana ushindakenyo mu Mbimbiliya ngwo Zambi kwatwama. Mbimbiliya yakutukolweza hanga tukolese ufulielo wetu muli Zambi. Kashika, kutwatambile kutayiza chamutayijila yuma yize mayingeleja akulongesa. Twatamba kuzachisa “kunyonga cha mana.” (A-Roma 12:1; 1 Yoano 5:20) Tala yize Mbimbiliya yakulongesa hakutwala ku chikuma chino:
Kumona chize yuma yapwa yakululieka mu malilu ni hashi, chakusolola ngwo kwatwama umwe Sakatanga. Mbimbiliya yinambe ngwo: “Mumu 
... (638 chars skipped) ... 
ngwo Sakatanga kapwa mukwa zango yoze wakuzanga hanga tukuchise zala yetu ya ku spiritu.—Mateu 4:4.
Uprofeto wa mu Mbimbiliya kaliangile kuusoneka mu yimako-yimako ha miaka yinji kunyima, chikwo nawa wamanunukine mu yimako-yimako. Chino chinasolola ngwo, uprofeto wacho wakatukile kuli mutu umwe yoze ukwete ndundo jinji.—2 Petulu 1:21.
Atu waze asonekene Mbimbiliya kapwile ni chinyingi hakutwala ku ciência, chinyingi chize atu ha mashimbu jacho te kanyingikine. Chakutalilaho, ku mashimbu a kunyim
... (638 chars skipped) ...
go, mumu liaka hano hashi hali lamba lipwahaha? Mumu liaka mayingeleja keshi kukwasa atu kulinga yuma yipema, alioze yuma yipi?—Titu 1:16.
a Umwe mukwa-mana avuluka ngwo Allan Sandage yamba hakutwala ku malilu ni hashi ngwenyi: “Ku nyonga liami, malilu ni hashi hi yuma ko yize yasolokele susumuku hanji yalilingile yene. Ndo kupwe umwe yoze waluliekele yuma yacho. Kuli yami Zambi kali chijimbikilo. Alioze, ndo kupwe umwe Sakatanga watangile yuma yeswe, mumu yuma kuyishi kulingiwa chamulingiwila.”

... (352 chars skipped) ... 
ietu lipeme. Yetwe nawa twakulikungulula mukachi ka pwoso hanga tulilongese yihanda yitatu ya malongeso. Chihanda chitangu cha 25-a minutu lie Longeso lia Mbimbiliya mu Chikungulwila, liakupwa ni yihula ni yikumbululo hanga tukolese malinjiekela jetu a shimbi ni uprofeto wa mu Mbimbiliya. Mba hakusula Shikola ya Milimo ya Zambi yakuputuka ni kutanga cha Mbimbiliya, mba mandumbu mahasa kuhana kumbululo lio mu yisoneko yize aluliekanga. UNO TWATELA CHIKUPU KUFWELELA VYUMA YAHANJIKA MBIMBILIYA TAHI?
Eyo, mwomwo yavishina vino vivali:
Kalunga kasaka vatu vayande chipwe kuvalinga mwamupiko. Achishinganyekenu omu Yehova Kalunga evwile hakumona vatu jenyi vakushikulu navavayanjisa chikuma. Mbimbiliya ngwayo apihililile mwomwo “vavayanjishilenga nakuvamwenesa malwa.”—Vaka-kuyula 2:18.
Yehova ahunga vaze veji kulemekanga vakwavo. Chakutalilaho, Mbimbiliya ngwayo, eji kwivwilanga unyengwe “mavoko akumwanga manyinga ayou azeneka chuma

1. Hinyi watwinka wumi?
YEHOVA ‘hiNzambi wamumi.’ (Yeremiya 10:10) Diyi Nleñi yetu nawa watwinka wumi. Bayibolu yahoshaña nawu: “Waleñeli yuma yejima nawa muloña wankeñelu yeyi, dichiyekalililiku nawa dichiwayileñeleli.” (Chimwekeshu 4:11) Yehova wakeñeleña nindi twikali amomi. Wumi hichawaana chalema chatwinkayi.—Tañenu Masamu 36:9.

(Ezekeli 3:17-21) Kufwana kapostolu Pawulu, tukuhosha netu: “Hinikweti muloña wamashi awantu ejimaku, muloña hinnaleki kuyileja enu nkeñelu yejima yaNzambiku.” (Yilwilu 20:26, 27) Twamwekeshaña netu twalemesha nankashi wumi nimashi neyi tuleja antu kulonda amwiluki Yehova nichalemeshayi wumi.

Atu katangile mu ‘chano cha Zambi.’ Tuli ni nyonga lia kusakula chipi ni chipema. Mutuhasa kusakula kuzachisa limi lietu hanga tuwayile Yehova ni kumuhalisa.—Uputukilo 1:27.

Nyi twachilinga, Yehova matuwahisa ni chiseke haliapwila ni kutwaha mwono wa mutolo mu paraisu.—Tiangu 1:25; Usolwelo 1:3.

1. Mwomwo ika twatela kulemesa Kalunga?
Kalunga wamuchano apwa hiKalunga uze Atangile vyuma vyosena. Katwama namaputukilo chipwe makumishiloko. (Samu 90:2) Kuli ou Kalunga kukiko kwafuma mujimbu wamwaza ou watwama muMbimbiliya. (WaChimoteu 1, 1:11) Twatela kulemesa kaha ou Kalunga, mwomwo ikiye atuhana kuyoya.—Tangenu Kusoloka 4:11.
2. Uno Kalunga apwa ngachilihi?
Namutu amonaho lyehi Kalunga wauchi mwomwo apwa Shipilitu, kulumbununa nge kuyoya chenyi chapwa chakulipwila chikuma kuhambakana chak
... (901 chars skipped) ... 
fumisa mujiMbimbiliya jajivulu nakushishisamo mazu akufwana nge Mwata chipwe Kalunga. Oloze omu vasonekele Mbimbiliya, lijina lyaKalunga mulyapwile mapapa kafwe 7,000. Yesu akafwilenga vatu vatachikize lijina lyaKalunga hakuvanangula Mazu aKalunga.—Tangenu Yowano 17:26.
4. Uno Yehova atuzakama tahi?
Uno kuyanda chinalisale ngana mukaye chasolola nge Yehova Kalunga katuzakamako tahi? Vatu vamwe vamba ngwavo Kalunga ikiye eji kutuyanjisanga mangana atweseke, oloze omu keshi mukikoko.—Tangenu WaYak
... (901 chars skipped) ...
a tumwivwise kuwaha numba tuhu shimbu jimwe katweshi kutesamoko. Ngachize numba tuhu katwakupuka mwosenako, oloze tunahase chikupu kulivwisa kuwaha usoko wetu naKalunga.—Tangenu Samu 103:12-14; WaYakova 4:8.
Twatela kuzanga chikuma Yehova kuhambakana vatu vosena mwomwo ikiye atuhana kuyoya. (Mako 12:30) Hakulinangula vyavivulu vyakupandama kuli Kalunga nakulinga vyuma mwamilweza namusolola chikupu ngwenu mwamuzanga, nakupandama jino chikuma kuli ikiye.—Tangenu WaChimoteu 1, 2:4; WaYowano 1, 5:3.

Twafuma kuvisemwa nakumalimi akulisezaseza, oloze twapwa vakulinunga hakufwila kuzata mulimo umwe kaha. Chikumanyi, tuvosena twasaka kuvumbika Yehova, mwenya Mbimbiliya uze atengele vyuma vyosena. Tweji kulondezezanga chakutalilaho chaYesu Kulishitu kaha tweji kwivwanga kuwaha kutuvuluka ngwavo vaka-Kulishitu. Tuvosena tweji kuyanga nakukafwa vatu valinangule vyuma vyamuMbimbiliya naWangana waKalunga. Tweji kwambululanga mujimbu wamwaza wakuvuluka Yehova Kalunga naWangana wenyi, ngocho evi vikiko vyalingisa tulivuluke ngwetu Vinjiho jaYehova.
Sandasandenu vyuma vili hakeyala yetu. Tangenu Mbimbiliya vanamihakilaho. Tangenu mangana mututachikize kanawa nakwijiva vyuma twafwelela.

i mu vuthunga nga muleka vakweni vimunalilongetha mu Mbimbiliya. Vyuma vyavivi vili na kulingiwa mu kaye, vili na kwombwetha vanu vavangi. (Ezekiyele 9:4) Hamo neni muthzivukako vamo. Valekeni vyuma vyavivwa vitunavandamena kulutwe. Nga muya ku viwano thimbu yoshe na kuleka vakweni vuthunga vwa mu Mbimbiliya, cho kumushungwiya lalo kukala mu vulombelo vwa makuli na kulinga vilika vyakalamo. Nga mwangula kulemetha Yehova mu vuthunga, mupwa va kuvwahelela, cho lalo amikwithula manene.—Malaki 3:10.

chimwe chuma mu mbunge ye?

YIKA MBIMBILIYA YINAMBE
“Zambi ya mwilu makakolesa umwe wanangana uze kuuchi kanonga.”—Daniele 2:44.
“Kuli yetu hikwasemuka umwe kemba, chiyulo kumuchikapwa ha chipaya chenyi.”—Izaia 9:6.
KUCHI MALIJI WANO MAHASA KUKUKWASA
SHINA MUTUHASA KUTAYIZA YIZE MBIMBILIYA YINAMBE?
Ewa, mutuhasa kuyitayiza hamukunda wa yitela yaali:
-
Yesu kasolwele yuma yize wanangana wa Zambi muyikalinga. Yesu kalongesele tumbaji twenyi kulemba hanga Wanangana wa Zambi wize nawa hanga upale wenyi ulingiwe hano hashi. (Mateu 6:9, 10) Iye kasolwele nawa chize makakumbulula kulemba chacho.
Muze Yesu apwile hano hashi, iye kalishile atu, kawukile mieji, nawa kahindwishile afu! (Mateu 15:29-38; Yoano 11:38-44) Yesu Mwanangana mu Wanangana wa Zambi, kasolwele yuma yipema yize Wanangana wa Zambi muyikalinga hali atu.—Usolwelo 11:15.
-
Yuma yize yinalingiwa hano hashi yinasolola ngwo Wanangana wa Zambi unakundama. Yesu kambile ngwo muze Wanangana wa Zambi kanda uchineha sambikila hano hashi, hashi muhapwa jita, zala ni minyiko.—Mateu 24:3, 7.
Ya ngwo Wanangana wa Zambi kwasala hakehe uhwise yuma yacho.
ACHI NYONGA KAMA
Mu Wanangana wa Zambi kuchi atu makapwa?
Mbimbiliya yinakumbulula chihula chino mu MASAMU 37:29 ni IZAIA 65:21-23.

Hakukavangiza chakutalilaho chavaka-Kulishitu vamulikulukaji lyamyaka lyakulivanga, Vinjiho jaYehova kavatwama namihato javatwamina muliuka lyavoko. Vosena vaze vambapachisa muliuka lyetu vavavuluka ngwavo vaka-kuzata kaha veji kwazananga mumulimo wakwambulula nakunangula vatu. Muchikungulwilo hichikungulwilo chaVinjiho mwatwama Vinjiho vakuheta 100. Kaha malunga vakuhya kushipilitu veji kupwanga “vakulwane” muchikungulwilo. (WaChituse 1:5)

1, 2. Yehova wakeñaña nindi yisaka yikali ñahi?
YEHOVA NZAMBI wasumbwishili antu atachi. Bayibolu yatulejaña nawu waleñeli mumbanda watachi, ‘hakumutwala kudi muntu.’ Adama wazañaleli nankashi chakwila wahosheli nindi: “Iwu neli dehi ifwaha dami, neli dehi mujimba wami.” (Kutachika 2:22, 23) Chumichi chinakumwekesha nawu Yehova wakeñaña adisumbula kwikala namuzañalu.
2 Chawushona, antu amavulu kanda ekaleñahu dehi namuzañalu muchisaka. Hela chochu, muBayibolu mwekala nshimbi jajivulu jikukwasha 
... (3070 chars skipped) ... 
kwiladi neyi nakaani munafuukuliyi nfumwindi? Watela kuhosha chinakutoñojokayi nakalemesha. Chakutalilahu, Sara wahosheli yuma yabulili kukeñayi Abarahama, Yehova wamulejeli Abarahama nindi: “Kumina dakutiya mwizu daSara.” (Kutachika 21:9-12) Mpinji jikwawu, iyala mukwaKristu nateli kufuukula yuma yinaambuki nachahosha Bayibolu, dichi ñodindi watela kumukwasha. (Yilwilu 5:29; Aefwesesa 5:24) Mumbanda wamuwahi wahembaña chisaka. (Tañenu Titusa 2:4, 5.) Neyi nfumwindi nianyanindi amona chazatañayi
... (3070 chars skipped) ...
fumwenu nawa londelenu chakutalilahu chamumbanda ashimunawu haYishimu 31:10-31. Neyi mudi anvwali, dizishenu anyanenu kulonda amukeñi Nzambi. (Yishimu 22:6) Neyi mudi tata yawantu, lombolenu chisaka chenu “chachiwahi.” (1 Timotewu 3:4, 5; 5:8) Enu anyana ovwahilenuña anvwali jenu. (Akolosi 3:20) Mwatela kwiluka nenu muntu wejima muchisaka waluwañeshaña, dichi ikalenu adizoza nawa danakenenuña wumu namukwawu. Mwamweni, muBayibolu mwekala kufumba kwaYehova kunateli kukwasha muntu wejima muchisaka.

1. Uno mujimbu uka wafuma Kuli Kalunga?
Kalunga asaka vatu valivwise kuwaha kuyoya hamavu. Atangile vyuma vyosena vyatwama hamavu mwomwo yakuzanga vatu. Kalinwomu awahise vyuma mangana vatu vatwame kanawa mukaye kosena. Mwasokola vatu kukuyanda chosena.—Tangenu Yelemiya 29:11.
Kakweshi fulumende yize yahasa kufumisako ukenya, misongo nakufwako. Oloze kuli mujimbu wamwaza. Kalinwomu vene ngana Kalunga mwafumisako jifulumende javatu josena nakuneha fulumende yenyi. Vatu navakapwamo navakalivwisa k
... (119 chars skipped) ... 
 wamwaza uli nakusakiwa mukapachapacha?
Kuyanda nachikakuma omu Kalunga mwakafumisako vatu vavapi vosena. (Zefwanyiya 2:3) Uno vyuma kana navikasoloka lwola muka? Mazu aKalunga avulukile chimweza vyumevi vili nakuyanjisa vatu makumbi ano. Vyuma vili nakusoloka makumbi ano vili nakusolola nge Kalunga kalinwomu awahise vyuma.—Tangenu WaChimoteu 2, 3:1-5.
3. Vyuma muka twatela kulinga?
Twatela kulinangula vyaKalunga muMazu enyi Mbimbiliya. Mbimbiliya yapwa nge himukanda uze atusonekela chisemi chet
... (119 chars skipped) ...
uyoya haya myaka yosena hano hamavu. Vatu vamwe kaveshi kuwahililako hakumimona vali nakumikafwa mwivwishise kanawa Mbimbiliya. Oloze kanda kulitwamina kulinangulako mangana mukapwe nakuyoya chahaya myaka yosena chize chapwa hikuyoya chimwe chamwaza chikuma.—Tangenu Vishimo 29:25; Kusoloka 14:6, 7.

LWOLA lumwe Yesu asanyikilenga mapwevo ngwenyi, “Ove pwevo.” Chakutalilaho, omu apwile nakuka pwevo umwe uze azembamine hamyaka 18, Yesu ambile ngwenyi: “Ove pwevo, unasokoka kukuviza chove.” (Luka 13:10-13) Likumbi limwe Yesu asanyikile naye wakumusema mujila kaneyi, mwomwo halwola kana kavachimwenenga nge hikasautuko. (Yowa. 19:26; 20:13) Kwapwile nawa hanjikiso yikwavo yamwaza yize vazachishilenga vatu.
Mbimbiliya yazachisa mazu eka amwaza alikoji hakuvuluka mapwevo vamwe. Yesu azachishile ma
... (599 chars skipped) ... 
a alitwaminyine kuhita. Ashinganyekele ngwenyi kaveshi kumutachikizako, oloze Yesu ahulishile ngwenyi: “Iya nangukwate?” (Luka 8:45-47) Ngocho evwile woma nakuputuka kulichikimina, kaha alimbilile hamavu kumeso aYesu “nakumulweza muchano wosena.”—Mako 5:33.
Oloze Yesu amukolezezele ngwenyi: “Ove mwanami, likolezeze.” (Mateu 9:22) Vatu valinangula chikuma Mbimbiliya vamba ngwavo, hanjikiso yachiHepeleu nachiHelase yakwamba ngwavo “ove mwanami” yapwa yalikoji nakukokweza. Yesu amufwelelesele nawa 
... (599 chars skipped) ...
yi: “Vanangulweze mujimbu wavyuma vyosena unalingi kuli nokowenu [tuliwe Nowemi] . . . Yehova akufwete havyuma vyamwaza unalingi.”—Lute 2:8-12.
Yesu naMbowaze vahana chakutalilaho chamwaza vakulwane vavaka-Kulishitu. Lwola lumwe, vakulwane vavali vanahase kutambukila pwevo muka-Kulishitu uze anakusakiwa kumukafwa nakumukolezeza naVisoneka. Hakulomba Yehova avatwaminyine nakwivwilila kanawa vyuma mwavalweza ou ndumbwetu, vakulwane navamukolezeza nakumuvendejeka kuzachisa Mazu aKalunga.—Loma 15:4.

Yiyulo ya mu Mbimbiliya muyihasa kukukwasa kutepulula kusakalala. Chipwe ngwe kutuchi kuhasa kuhwisa yuma yeswe yize yakututwala mba tusakalale, nihindu Sakatanga yetu mahasa kuyihwisa. Iye hanasakula Yesu hanga atukwase. Muze apwile hano hashi, Yesu kalingile yuma ya kukomwesa. Alioze kulutwe, makalingila atu yuma yinji yipema hano hashi. Chakutalilaho:
YESU MAKAUKA ATU NGWE CHIZE ALINGILE KUNYIMA.
“Yaneha kuli iye waze eswe ayiza misongo yeka ni yeka . . . , mba yaauka eswe.”—MATEU 4:24; NWT.
YESU MAKAHANA YIHELA YA KUTWAMA NI KULIA KULI ESWE.
Ayo [waze makayula kuli Kristu] “kumakatunga mazuwo ni kutwamamo; kumakatumba minda ya uva ni kulia ye mihuko yamo. Kechi katunga hanga akwo akatwamemo, kechi katumba hanga akwo akalieko.—IZAIA 65:21, 22.
UNGUVULU WA YESU MUUKANEHA SAMBUKILA NI UKULUNGUNGA HANO HASHI.
“Ha matangwa jenyi akwa ululi kumakawaha [ni] kulumbama cha sambukila ndo kakweji wakuhi nawa. Kumakapwa ni chiyulo chize ku kalunga-lwiji ndo ku kalunga-lwiji; chize ku lwiji Ufrateze ndo ku masongo a hashi. . . . Akwa kole jenyi kumakalesa fufuta.”—SAMU 72:7-9.
YESU MAKAHWISA UPI WESWE.
“Chiswale ni mukwa kuhona kumakaavwila keke. Kumakalamwina mwono wa waze anahono. Kumakakuula mwono wo ku yihungumiona ni uswi.”—SAMU 72:13, 14.
YESU MAKAHWISA LAMBA NI KUFWA
“Kufwa kuchichi kapwa nawa; kukuchi kapwa nawa kunenganyana, chipwe miteto, chipwe yikola, ka.”—USOLWELO 21:4.

Kumbululo lia mu Mbimbiliya
Ewa, Zambi kakulihulumba muze umwe kavumbi kenyi anayiji. Mbimbiliya yinalakenya ngwo: “Yehova mamutakamisa ha muu wenyi wa kukokoloka.” (Samu 41:3) Nyi ukwete musongo uze kuushi kuya, yikuma yino muyihasa kukukwasa:
Lemba ni kwita tachi hanga unyongonone. Muhasa kupwa ni “sambukila ya Zambi, yize yakuhiana kunyonga cheswe.” Sambukila yacho muyihasa kukukwasa kunyongonona ni kuhona kusakalala chinji.—A-Fwilipu 4:6, 7.
Pwako ni nyonga lialita. Mbimbiliya yinambe ngwo: “Mbunge ya chiseke yapwa yitumbo yipema; alioze spiritu yize yamakuka kuyakuumisa yifwaha.” (Yishima 17:22.) Lilongese kupwa mukwa kusehejela, mumu achi muchihasa kukukwasa ku mujimba.
Kolesa ufulielo we ku yuma ya kulutwe lia matangwa. Kutalatala chipema muchihasa kukukwasa kupwa ni uwahililo, chipwe ngwe ukwete musongo uze kuushi kuya. (A-Roma 12:12) Mbimbiliya yakulakenya shimbu lize “niumwe watungako mamba ngwenyi, Ngunayiji.” (Izaia 33:24) Zambi makauka misongo yize kuyishi kuya, misongo yize akwa Ciência musono keshi kuhasa kuuka. Chakutalilaho, Mbimbiliya yinasolola chize ushinakaji muukahwa ha kwamba ngwo: “Musunya wenyi upwe nawa musunya wa ukweze; akahiluke nawa ku tachi ja ukweze wenyi.”—Yombi 33:25.
Utowezo: Chipwe ngwe Yela ja Yehova kananyingika ngwo Zambi kakukwasa atu, nihindu muze o akuyiza kakuya ni kufupa ukwaso wa mandotolo. (Marku 2:17) Kutushi kusakwila mutu niumwe uukiso uze atamba kutayiza. Mutu ni mutu katamba kukwata chiyulo chenyi mwene ha chikuma chacho.

Mwomwo vaIsalele vanatatwokesa Kalunga naMose. Vanakuyayavala ngwavo: ‘Munatulowela ika muEjipitu tufwile mupambo? Kakweshi kulya chipwe meyako. Tunakwivwa unyengwe kulya lika mana.’

muwa hikutala kulinoka waunengu nakuyoya cheka.

Mwomwo valunga napwevo vakulivanga, vaAlama naEve, vafumine kuli Yehova, kahetu tuvana vavo. Oloze Yehova natuwahishila jila yakukatwama haya myaka yosena.

Yesu vamujihile “hakumusukika hachitondo.” (Vilinga 5:30, The New Jerusalem Bible) Vaka-kusoneka Mbimbiliya vosena valumbununa nge, Yesu vamusukikile hac
... (1542 chars skipped) ...

... (1542 chars skipped) ...
ka vavene, oloze vamuyoyelenga uze avafwililile, uze nawa vasangwile.” (Wavaka-Kolinde 2, 5:14, 15) Vaka-Kulishitu vavakunyula nazangi yakulipwila yize Kulishitu asolwele nakuvalingisa valumune vyuma vimwe mukuyoya chavo mangana vamulondezeze. Kulinga chuma kana cheji kusololanga nge vavumbika chikuma Yesu kuhambakana kuzachisa kala chinjikizo chamukwitava.
“Omu mukiko vene mwaya muchima waTata, ngwenyi weshowo mwamona Mwana nakumufwelela, atela kupwa nakuyoya chahaya myaka yosena.”—Yowano 6:40.

Tunyongenu ngwe tuli mu mbonge ya Yeriku. Mbonge yacho te yatwama mu chifuchi cha Kanana, atu jamo te keshi kufuliela Yehova. Pwo yoze te akuvuluka ngwo Rahape te mwe atwama.
Muze te uchili kanuke, iye kevwile sango ja chize Mose atetele Kalunga-Lwiji-Muchila ni kusongwela A-Izalele hanga atuhuke mu Engitu. Iye kevwile nawa chize Yehova akwashile A-Izalele hanga akumbe jita kuli akwa kole jo. Haliapwila iye hevwa ngwo A-Izalele hasa chilombo cho hakamwihi ni Yeriku!
Rahape kaswekele ngendeshi mu

 lia Rahape. Kashika mwanangana yatumako amwe malunga hanga aakwate. Rahape yasweka ngendeshi jacho aali ha fulumba lia zuwo lienyi nawa yamba kuli malunga waze mwanangana atumine ngwenyi: ‘Ngendeshi te kuno ali, alioze atuhukanga kulu mu mbonge. Nyi nwaakaula haliapwila, munuhasa kwaakwata!’ Yena unanyingika mumu liaka Rahape anakasweka ngendeshi?
Muze ngendeshi te kanda achikatuka ku zuwo lia Rahape, ayo yamulakenya ngwo iye ni asoko jenyi makaalamwina muze Yeriku mayinongesa. Yena unanyingika
... (284 chars skipped) ...
 chikolo. Hohene, Yehova yapuzula yipanga ya mbonge ya Yeriku. Alioze zuwo lili ni lwoji muchila haze lia kapenda liso kupuzuka! Yena muhasa kumona zuwo liacho ha chizulie?
YiKa yena muhasa kulilongesa hali Rahape?— Rahape yafuliela Yehova ha mukunda wa kunyingika yuma yeswe ya ukomokeso yize Yehova alingile. Ni unalilongesa yuma yinji yaukomokeso hakutwala kuli Yehova. Ni yena unafuliela Yehova ngwe chize Rahape alingile?

Uwayilo wa mu Usoko Yika?
Ha matangwa a shakulu, Yehova te kakuzanga ngwo asoko apwe hamuwika hanga alikolese mu ufulielo ni kutatwisa asoko jo. (Shimbi Yamuchiali 6:6, 7) Kashika Yela ja Yehova noo ha pwoso jeswe kakululieka uwayilo wa mu usoko ni sambukila yeswe, hanga alilongese yikuma yilemu, ni kuhanjika ize muyihasa kwakwasa ku ufulielo wo. Nawa nyi watwama ukawe, yili shimbu yipema ya kusakula kulilongesa Mbimbiliya hanga uwayile Zambi.

Oloze vavavulu vashinganyeka ngwavo lijina lyaKalunga kalyapwile muVisoneka VyachiHelase vyaVaka-Kulishitu vyakulivangako. Shikaho jiMbimbiliya jajivulu jamakumbi ano kajazachisa lijina Yehova hakwalumuna Tesetamende Yayihyako. Numba vene hakunungulula mazu aVisoneka VyachiHepeleu aze atwama navasona vaTetalang
... (3745 chars skipped) ...

Namikanda yimwe yamba ngwayo lijina lyaYesu lyalumununa ngwavo “Yehova Ikiye Ulwilo.”
Mikanda yavaYuleya yakulivanga yasolola nge vaka-Kulishitu vavaYuleya vazachishilenga lijina lyaKalunga mumikanda yavo. Mukanda waTosefta, wajishimbi jahakanwa kaha, uze vakumishile kusoneka mu 30
... (3745 chars skipped) ...
uman Bible (1999), yize yazachisa lijina “Jihova” mapapa 51 mujivesi 48, naMbimbiliya yaBatak (Toba) (1989) yakuIndonesia, yize yazachisa lijina “Jahowa” mapapa 110.
Chikupu vene, kuuli unjiho uze naulingisa lijina lyaKalunga Yehova valikindulwise muVisoneka VyachiHelase vyaVaka-Kulishitu. Omu mukiko vanalingi navaka-kwalumuna Mbimbiliya yaVisoneka vyaKaye Kakahya. Vavumbika chikuma lijina lyaKalunga, kaha vevwa woma kufumisa vyuma vimwe vize vyapwile muvisoneka vyakulivanga.—Kusoloka 22:18, 19.

1. Mbimbiliya Mwenyayo Iya?
Sango jipema jinambe ngwo, atu makapwa ni mwono wa mutolo hano hashi jili mu Mbimbiliya. (Masamu 37:29) Mbimbiliya yili ni 66 ya mikanda yikehe yikehe. Zambi kanakatuma 40 ja atu a ufulielo hanga asoneke Mbimbiliya. Mose kasonekene mikanda yitangu yitano, hikwapalika 3,500 a miaka. Mukanda wakusongo wa mu Mbimbiliya apostolo Yoano wausonekene, hiwalinga 1,900 ja miaka. Atu asonekene Mbimbiliya manyonga jaya anakasolola? Spiritu musandu ya Zambi ye yinakakwasa atu waze
... (422 chars skipped) ... 
e chize atu makapwa kulutwe lia matangwa.
Mutuhasa kutwaminina umwe mukanda umuwika wa Zambi, mukanda wacho ye Mbimbiliya. Mbimbiliya jinji kanajihana mu unji wa kama ja malimi. Mbimbiliya chipwe ngwe yili mukanda ukulu alioze yinalite ni yinyingi ya atu akwa mana (ciência). Nawa 40 ja atu waze anakasoneka Mbimbiliya kakalituchikile ha ize anakasoneka umwe ni mukwo. * Nawa Mbimbiliya yili umwe mukanda uze unalise ni yikwo, mumu unasolola utu wa zango lia Zambi, kashika uli ni tachi ja kwalumuna 
... (422 chars skipped) ...
i nawa yitanga ize Zambi apwile nayo kuli atu
4. Kuchi yena muhasa kunyingika Mbimbiliya?
Kamukanda kano mukakukwasa kunyingika Mbimbiliya ha kulinga chizechene Yesu alingile. Iye te kakutongola yimwe yihanda ya mu Mbimbiliya nikuhana ulumbunwiso “hanga anyingike ye Yisoneko.”
Yuma ize tunamono ngwe yipema yishikuhiana sango jipema ja Zambi. Alioze amwe atu keshi kujizanga, akwo kakujivwila kupiha. Yena kanda wakaula. Kutalatala che cha mwono wa mutolo chili hali yena mwene nyi wanyingika Zambi.

Yesu apwile kupenge natumbaji twenyi vawana, Petulu, Yakova, Yowano naAndelei nakushimutwila navo omu apwile kwakamwihi nakufwa. Omu Yesu apwilenga nakulumbununa chinjikizo chakwijivilaho kupwako chenyi mumakumbi akukuminyina, ahulishile chihula chachilemu ngwenyi: “Iya chikupu napu ndungo wakushishika wakuzangama, uze vatongwele kuli Kaka yenyi kumulamina vaka-kuzata kuzuvo yenyi, avahanenga kulya chavo halwola lwakutamo?” (Mateu 24:3, 45; Mako 13:3, 4) Yesu apwile nakufwelelesa tumbaji twenyi 
... (258 chars skipped) ... 
ndungo” eji kuhananga kulya chakushipilitu halwola lwakutamo kuli vaze eji kulemeselanga navo hamwe Yehova. Twapendamina halizavu lyou ndungo wakushishika atuhanenga “kulya chakutamo halwola lwakutamo.”—Luka 12:42.
Veji kulamanga vakuzuvo yaKalunga. (WaChimoteu 1, 3:15) Yesu ahanyine lizavu lyandungo mulimo wakuzakamanga chihanda chaliuka lyaYehova chahano hamavu. Ahanyine lizavu kana mulimo wakutala havyuma vyaliuka, nakutwaminyina mulimo wakwambulula, nakutunangula kuhichila muvikungulwilo vye
... (258 chars skipped) ...
la.
Lizavu lyandungo lyashishika hamuchano wamuMbimbiliya, nakumulimo wakwambulula mujimbu wamwaza, kaha nawa lyapwa lyakuzangama mujila lyeji kulaminangamo vyuma vyaKulishitu vyahano hamavu. (Vilinga 10:42) Yehova ali nakukisula mulimo walyeli lizavu hakuvulisa vatu vaze vali nakwiza muliuka nahakuvahana kulya chakushipilitu chachivulu.—Isaya 60:22; 65:13.
Iya vatongola kuli Yesu mangana alisenga tumbaji twenyi kulya chakushipilitu?
Uno ndungo apwa ngachilihi wakushishika kaha nawa wakuzangama?

Akwa-kuhengwola yisoneko kananyingika ngwo, jina lia Zambi lize likwete Sona jiwana (יהוה), liakusoloka yisuho 7,000 mu Yisoneko yitangu ya A-Hepreu. Alioze, anji a kuli ayo te kakunyonga ngwo jina liacho te kulishi kusoloka mu Yisoneko yitangu ya Ngregu ya Akwa-Kristu. Kashika Mbimbiliya jinji musono ja mu limi lia Chokwe keshi kusamo jina Yehova mu chihanda cha Usendo Waha. Chipwe muze akulumbununa versu ja Yisoneko ya A-Hepreu ha chihela haze hakusoloka Sona jiwana ja jina lia Zambi, akwa-kul
... (3522 chars skipped) ... 
ambi hanji kulivuluka, kachi Tiangu kakambile chocho.
-
Jina lia Zambi liakusoloka lia chipinji mu Yisoneko ya Ngregu ya Akwa-Kristu. Majina anji waze ali mu Yisoneko ya Ngregu ya Akwa-Kristu kakatukile ku jina lia Zambi. Mikanda yimwe yakulumbununa ngwo chipwe jina lia Yesu linalumbunuka ngwo, “Yehova iye Chilamwina.”
-
Mikanda yikulu ya A-Yunda yakusolola ngwo Akwa-Kristu A-Yunda te kakuvuluka jina lia Zambi mu mikanda yo. Tosefta, yimwe mikanda ya shimbi yize anakahwisa kusoneka ha miaka 300 
... (3522 chars skipped) ...
a mu limi lia Rotumano (1999), yize yinatongola jina “Jihova” yisuho 51 mu maversu 48, ni Mbimbiliya mu Bataque (Toba) (1989) ku Indonésia yize yinavuluka jina “Jahowa” yisuho 110.
Kashika yikuma yeswayi yinasolola ngwo, jina Yehova katamba kulihilwisa mu Yisoneko ya Ngregu ya Akwa-Kristu. Yenayi akwa-kulumbununa Mbimbiliya ya Yisoneko ya Chifuchi Chaha alinga. Ayo kakuvumbika chinji jina lia Zambi, kashika akwivwa woma wa kuchiza chuma cheswacho chapwile mu Yisoneko yitangu.—Usolwelo 22:18, 19.

1. Kukalanyi kwamonañawu antu?
YEHOVA hakeñeleña nindi antu ayandeña nakukala kwenzaña hamuloña wawushinakajuku. Ilaña, wakeñeleña nindi amayala niambanda akadiluñisheña chakadi kukatakata muParadisa. Chawushona, makonu “kuleña kwejima kwaabaña nakufunyisha hamu.” (Rom. 8:22) Munakutoñojoka nenu Nzambi watiyaña ñahi hakumona antu chinakuyandawu hamuloña wanshidi? Kubombelahu, atushinakaji amavulu ayishiyaña chisayikila hampinji yakeñañawu chikupu mu
... (6232 chars skipped) ... 
shinakajili, dichi akeñekeleña kuyikwasha. Anyanawu awamayala niañodijawu ayili nakutala anvwali jawu kwiluña Dakwakulehi Dakumusela kulonda amoni mwatela kuyikwashilawu. Chimwahitili mpinji, antu adisumbula ashakamineña kwituña daSouth America adiña nakutoñojoka kuleka mudimu wawu kulonda afunti kumukala. Nloñeshi wezanvu dawaeluda wamuchipompelu mwekala anvwali jawu wayitemesheleli nshiña. Aeluda amuchipompelu ashakamini hamu nakuhanjekahu nawa akeñeleña ana amishonali atwalekuhu namudimu wawu
... (6232 chars skipped) ...
ta mumakabi nimuyihuñu. Twahamekaña hakwikala nachikuhwelelu chamuchidiwu, “Dihu hafuma kubula kuzeya; muloña hela muntu wetu wahanzi wudi nakuya nakunoña, muntu wetu wamukachi wudi nakuya nakubalumuka wamwiha hefuku hefuku.” (2 Kor. 4:16-18; Heb. 6:18, 19) Kubombela hakutwalekahu nakwikala nachikuhwelelu chakola muyikaninu yaNzambi, chumanyi chinateli kuyikwasha kulonda muzateña chiwahi nyidimu yakwakamena atushinakaji? Muchibaaba chinalondeluhu tukahanjeka hanjila jajiwahi jinateli kuyikwasha.

CHIKUMA CHILEMU: Solola kuli waze unahanjika no ngwe waazanga chinji nawa unafupu kwaakwasa.
YIZE WATAMBA KULINGA:
Nyonga hali waze anakupanjika. Lulieka mbunge ye hakuliwulula yena mwene yipikalo yize akumona waze anakupanjika. Hanji ucheseka kunyonga ha chize ayo akwivwa.
Sakula kanawa maliji je. Sako tachi hanga uvwise kuwaha waze anakupanjika, waalembejeke ni kwaatakamisa. Kanda uhanjieka maliji waze meevwisa kupiha ku mbunge, hanji kusaula waze kafulielele muli Zambi ni kusaula yize ayo akufuliela.
Solola zango lie. Liji lie ni chize muzachisa mujimba we muyisolola zango uli nalio hali waze anakupanjika. Nyonga ha chize unasoloka ku meso; pwako ni kusehejela.

... (6605 chars skipped) ...

Kalunga atachikiza ngwenyi oholyapwa tuchili lika tuvatu vakuhona kukupuka mwosena. Chipwe ngocho, asaka tumuzange nakufwila kumwononoka. Kumbululo lia mu Mbimbiliya
Yehova iye Zambi wamwenemwene wa mu Mbimbiliya, Sakatanga wa yuma yeswe. (Usolwelo 4:11) Iye mwe Zambi ya Apalahama, Mose ni Yesu. (Uputukilo 24:27; Kutuhuka 15:1, 2; Yoano 20:17) Yehova hi Zambi wa vungu limuwika ko, alioze kali Zambi wa “hashi heswe.”—Samu 47:2.
Mbimbiliya yinasolola ngwo Yehova lie jina lia Zambi, jina liacho iye wika liatela. (Kutuhuka 3:15; Samu 83:18) Jina liacho linakatuka ku limi lia Hepreu lize linalumbunuka ngwo, “Nguli chize nguli.” Akwa-ku
... (1161 chars skipped) ... 
yakwamba ngwo, chili chipi kuvuluka jina lia Zambi. Muze apwile ni kutanga ni liji linene chimwe chisoneko chili ni jina lia Zambi, o kapwile ni kwalumuna maliji ni kusalakanyisaho maliji ngwe “Mwene” hanji “Zambi.” Kashika ha kupalika cha mashimbu mahuza wano yalimwanga, hachino atu yavulama chize te akutongola jina lia Zambi. a
Atu kakunyonga ngwo jina lia Zambi te kakulivuluka ngwo, “Iavé” hanji “Javé”, eka nawa kakwamba yuma yeka. Chimwe chivungo cha Mar Morto chili ni amwe maliji a mu mukan
... (1161 chars skipped) ...
hilweza chino chinalite nawa ni ha jina lia Yehova. Chipwe ngwe kutwanyingikine kanawa chize apwile ni kutongola jina lia Zambi, nihindu liatela kulilemesa ngwe chize liakusoloka mu Mbimbiliya.
a Nova Enciclopédia Católica (New Catholic Encyclopedia) edição yamuchiali, volume 14 mafwo 883-884, yinambe ngwo: “Ha kupalika cha mashimbu akehe muze undungo wahwile, atu yaputuka kulemesa chinji jina Yahweh, chocho yapwa ni chako chakwalumuna jina lino ni kusalakanyisaho jina ngwe ADONAI hanji ELOHIM.”

Vandolome na vandokathzi vetu vamo vapwile vethzi na vaka-kupangetha vumbanda vwa kupendetha vamo cho vapwile vaka-vupangala. Vakwavo vakele na kulikuwa vuy

Echi chalingiwile na mu chita cha myaka cha kulivanga, cho chili na kulingiwa na matangwa ano. (Loma 10:2) Ngechi, kutwapandele kuthinganyeka ngwetu munu atha kuthzivithitha chithoneka munima ya kumutandelacho lika. (1 Petu. 1:24, 25) Tulinga mwamuvwa kutanda Lijwi lya Njambi litangwa na litangwa na kupangetha vitutanda mu kuyoya kwetu na kulikwathethalyo mu kulongetha vakwetu. Kulinga ngocho kumwetha ngwavo twakandelela ku vwana vwa theho vutunatambula kuli Njambi na kuthingimika uje natwanavwo Yehova Njambi.

“Nyi umwe lunga malikolweza hanga apwe mukulwana wa mu chikungulwila, kanazange mulimo upema.”—1 TIMO. 3:1.
YIZE MUTULILONGESA
Ha mutwe uno, mutumonaho yimwe yitanga ya mu Mbimbiliya yize ndumbu wa lunga atamba kupwa nayo nyi kanazange kupwa mukulwana wa mu chikungulwila.
1-2. “Mulimo uka upema” makulwana a mu chikungulwila akulinga?
NYI unakalakala ngwe kavumbi, kota unalikolweza hanga upwe ni yitanga yize muyikukwasa kupwa mukulwana wa mu chikungulwila. Shina unazange kulinga “mulimo upema” uz
... (5623 chars skipped) ... 
 hiunambata mba unazange kupwa mukulwana wa mu chikungulwila, lufuma wa usoko we neye kali mulemu. Kashika, watamba “kusongwela kanawa usoko we.” Maliji wano kanalumbunuka ngwo, watamba kufunga usoko we ni zango ni kukwata yiyulo yize muyiyukisa eswe mu usoko. Chikwo nawa, watamba kusongwela uwayilo wa mu usoko, kusa shindakenyo ngwo asoko je kakuya ku kukunguluka cheswe, ni kwakwasa hanga apwe ni kwambujola. Mumu liaka chino chili chilemu? ulwila ha chize muhasa kuchilulieka.
18. Yika tuvumbi eswe mu chikungulwila atamba kulinga?
18 Yetu eswe, kuchingako makulwana a mu chikungulwila, twatamba kununga ni kusa tachi hanga tupwe ni yitanga yize twahengwola ha mutwe uno. (Fwili. 3:16) Shina uli kavumbi? Nyi uli kavumbi, kanda usulila hazehene, eta kuli Yehova hanga akufumbe ni kukukwasa uhase kukalakala chinji mu chikungulwila. (Iza. 64:8) Pundu lume, Yehova mawahisa tachi je hanga ujame ni kukutongola ngwe mukulwana mu chikungulwila.

... (227 chars skipped) ...

TAMBWILENU WULOKU MUYUMA YADIZISHAÑA BAYIBOLU
Hadaha mukutachika kutoñojoka nenu nsañu yimunatañi hamafu akutachikilahu antesha yakutwamba. Ilaña Nzambi nashiiki nindi katataka yahimpi yuma yejimiyi hamaseki nawa Bayibolu yinashimuni chakayihimpayi.
Bayibolu yashimuna yuma yayivulu. Yatulejaña yuma yitwatela kwila kulonda twikali namuzañalu nikwikala nawumi wawuwahi chayinu mpi
... (227 chars skipped) ...
:
Chumanyi chinaleteshi tukuhweleli netu Nzambi wakela yuma yejima yinashiikiyi?
Chineli munakutaña wunu mukanda chinamwekeshi hatooka nawu munakukeña kwiluka yuma yadizishaña Bayibolu. Wunu mukanda wukuyikwasha. Maparagilafu akweti malwihu, akuyikwasha kwiluka chiwahi chahosha Bayibolu. Antu amavulu atiyaña kuwaha kuhanjeka nsañu yamuBayibolu nawaYinsahu jaYehova. Tunakuhweleli netu ninenu mukuzañalala. Tunakulomba netu Nzambi yayikiswili hampinji yimukwiluka yuma yinateli kutudizisha Bayibolu.

... (4873 chars skipped) ...

13 Mbimbiliya yinasolola chiseke chize evwile angelo ashishika muze ahangile Satana ni andemoniu jenyi mu malilu. Tunatange chino: “Ivwenu chiseke, yenu malilu, ni yenu nwatwamamo!” (Usolwelo 12:12) Haliapwila mu malilu muli sambukila ni kulivwashana, mumu eswe waze 
... (4873 chars skipped) ...
hinji mu uprofeto wa Mbimbiliya. Yuma yize yalingiwile ha mwaka 1914 yinasolola ngwo yize ayo ambile yili yamwenemwene. Yesu yaputuka kuyula ngwe Mwanangana ha mwaka wacho. (Samu 110:2) Ha shimbu liacho, yanyasa Satana hano hashi, kashika, “mwaka ukepe wika ali nawo.” (Usolwelo 12:12) Kapitulu yoze masulaho mutulilongesa yuma yize yinasolola ngwo tuli ha mashimbu jacho. Mutulilongesa nawa ngwetu kwasala hakehe hanga Wanangana wa Zambi umanunune upale wa Zambi hano hashi.—Tala Maliji Akusongo 22.

YIKA WATAMBA KULINGA?
Achinyonga ha chino: Helena kanyingika Miji ha tukweji aali wika, alioze iye kakwivwa ngwe kanamunyingika ha miaka yinji. Ayo kakulisonekena matangwa eswe ni kuhanjika ha mashimbu eswe ha telefone, nawa kakulilweza yize mutu ni mutu akunyonga! Haliapwila Miji kazangile wika kuhanjika, alioze kanazange nawa yuma yeka.
Ha tukweji aali apalika, Miji ni Helena kakulikwata ni kulimbejala. Helena kazangile hanga anunge ni kulinga yuma yacho. Alioze nawa iye kazangile kutokesa use
... (391 chars skipped) ... 
alonika 4:3.

Akwa-mana kawana ngwo akweze anji waze akulinga utanji kakupwa ni yipikalo yinji ku mwono wo, ngwe ai?

Unji wa Yela ja Yehova 35.000 waze te atwama mu Alemanha ni mu yifuchi muze apwile ni kuyula kuli A-Nazista kafwile, 1,500 kafwile ha mashimbu ja Holocausto. Kutwanyingikine chitela chize chaashihile. Alioze amu atu machinunga ni kuhengwola, unji wa waze afwile yikuma yikwo nawa muyihasa kusoloka.
Kuchi ayo afwile?
Kushiha: Unji wa Yela ja Yehova 400 kaashihile mu Alemanha ni muze yifuchi yikwo muze te akuyula kuli A-Nazista. Anji a kuli waze ashihile kaasopesele ni kwapatwila kufwa. Akwo kaaloz
... (1150 chars skipped) ... 
 ha hashi heswe musono, waze atwamine mu unguvulu wa Nazista te keshi kulinjisa mu yuma ya mafwefwe. (Yoano 18:36) Kashika, ayo alitunyine
Kulinga mulimo wa uswalale hanji mulimo weswawo unatale ha yuma ya jita.—Izaia 2:4; Mateu 26:52.
Kusakula nguvulu hanji kunjila mu chimwe chizavu cha A-Nazista.—Yoano 17:16.
Kumeneka suástica hanji kwamba ngwo, “Heil Hitler!”—Mateu 23:10; 1 A-Korindu 10:14.
Mumu lia kununga ni kulinga milimo yo ya ku ufulielo. Chipwe ngwe kapwile ni kwakanjisa kulinga yuma ya
... (1150 chars skipped) ...
e anaasopesa.
Yihela ya kushihila atu: Yela ja Yehova kanji-kanji te kakwashihila mu mazuwo a ususu, mu Berlin-Plötzensee, Brandemburgo ni Halle/Saale. Chikwo nawa, kuhengola chasolwele yihela yikwo 70 kuze ashihilile Yela ja Yehova.
Amwe waze ashihile
Jina: Rudolf Auschner
Ku chihela kuze amushihilile: Halle/Saale
Rudolf kamushihile muze te ali wika ni miaka 17, ha 22 Setembro, 1944. Ha mukanda wa kushika naye, iye yasoneka ngwenyi: “Mandumbu anji kanyongonona, kashika ni yami mungunyongonona.”

KAPOSHI KAKUTALILA (KAKUDIZAMU) SEPTEMBER 2014
Mukanu kaposhi mudi yibaaba yakudizamu kutachika haOctober 27 nakushika haNovember 30, 2014.
Chinu chibaaba chikushimuna yuma yaleñela antu amavulu kukuhwelela nawu aYinsahu jaYehova akweti chalala. Tukuhanjeka cheñi yuma yaleñela aYinsahu aweni kukuhwelela nawu akweti chalala.
Antu ejima amonaña lukadi muloña wakushakama mukaayi kaSatana. Njilanyi jikwawu jazatishañayi Satana hakulukuka? Tunateli kudiloñesha ñahi kushinda lukadi?
Anvwali akweti mudimu wakulela anyanawu “nakuyibabesha nikuyikonkomwena mudi Mwanta.” (Aefwesesa 6:4) Ichi chibaaba chinakuhosha njila jisatu jinateli kukwasha anvwali kubiña anyanawu nikuyikwasha kulonda amukeñi Yehova.
Kufwa niyuma yejima yatama yaletaña makabi aweni. Muloñadi antu chafwilañawu? Indi ‘chilumbu chakukuminina, kufwa akamunoñesha ñahi?’ (1 Akorinda 15:26) Talenu ñakwilu chiyamwekeshaña wuñanji waYehova, maanindi, sweje-e kukeña kukwetiyi.
Akwakudifukula aYehova amavulu azataña nañovu mumudimu wampinji yejima. Tunateli kwiladi kulonda twanukeña ‘mudimu wachikuhwelelu wazataña’ antu adi mumudimu wampinji yejima?

Yehova Nzamb udi Sakatang wetu. Watanga yom yawonsu, yimekena ku mes ni yakad kumekan. Kurutu atanga yom yimekena ku mes, watanga angel avud nakash. Angel ading mutapu ik? Angel adi antu atangay Yehova adia mudi amwinend. Tukutwishap kuyiman, mulong tukutwishap kumuman Nzamb. Mwangel wa kusambish watangay Yehova wikala nkwash wend. Mwangel winou wamukwasha Yehova kutang atutumbu, ma planet, ni yom yikwau yawonsu. Umwing wa ma planet minam utazukinau anch divu, yidi ndond yetu yiwamp ya kushakam.
Chawiy Yehova warijeka divu mulong annam ni antu ashakamap. Watanga muten mulong wa kulet chitokish ni chirungul pa divu. Watanga mikandu, aturung ni atuwit.
Yom ik yasalay kand? Yehova walonda anch: ‘nikimbin kutang maswuk ni mitond yikata kusong ntit, ni yikata kusong mabuj.’ Mitapu kushalijan ya mitond yikata kusong mabuj, ya maswuk, ni ya yisalamb yaminya. Yehova watanga kand annam—annam akata kutwik, akata kwisay, annam akata kwend, ni akata kwikak pansh. Watanga annam akemp akemp mudi atutwiy, ampuku, ni watanga kand ajim ajim mudi andjamb. Nnam ik ukatining nakash?
Chad Yehova wamuleja mwangel wakusambish anch: ‘El tutang muntu.’ Antu afanyina kushalijan nau annam. Antu afanyina kusal yom yivud. Afanyina kulond, kusip, ni kulembil. Afanyina kulam divu ni annam. Wij anch nany wading muntu wa kusambish? El tumanany.
“[Kwinsambishin] Nzamb watanga diur ni divu.”—Disambishil 1:1

Kumbululo lia mu Mbimbiliya
Niumwe unanyingika kanawa chize chifwa cha Yesu te chapwa wakuhi, mumu Mbimbiliya kuyishi kuhanjika ha chikuma chacho. Chino chinalumbunuka ngwo, chifwa chenyi hi chuma chilemu ko. Chipwe chocho Mbimbiliya yakutwaha nyonga lia chize Yesu te apwa.
Kupwa chenyi: Yesu kapwile Ka-Yunda. Kashika kupwa chenyi kota te chalifwa ni atu a ku munyachi wa naye. (A-Hepreu 7:14) Chino chakusolola ngwo Yesu te kalisele chinji ni atu akwo. Kashika, ha chisuho chimwe muze akatukile ku
... (538 chars skipped) ... 
da jize jakukanjisa malunga ngwo, “kanda nukapihisa masongo a wevu.” (Ulevi 19:27; A-Ngalashia 4:4) Chikwo nawa, Mbimbiliya yakuhanjika ha wevu wa Yesu ha umwe uprofeto hakutwala ku lamba lize te mamona.—Izaia 50:6.
Mujimba: Sango jakusolola ngwo Yesu kapwile ni tachi ku mujimba. Mu mulimo wenyi wa kwambujola hano hashi, kalingile wenyi usuku-usuku hashi. (Mateu 9:35) Ha yisuho yaali, kayile mu tembele ni kumwanga yuma ya waze apwile ni kulanjisamo. Ha chisuho chikwo nawa, Yesu yahosa shikote ya
... (538 chars skipped) ...
nawa kupwa hamwe ni Yesu.—Mateu 19:13-15; Marku 9:35-37.
Mahuza hakutwala ku chize Yesu apwa
Mahuza: Yesu kapwile mukwa-kulivutula, te keshi kuwahilila.
Umwenemwene: Yesu kapwile ni kwimbulula kanawa yitanga ya Tato, Yehova, yoze Mbimbiliya yakuvuluka ngwo Zambi ya uwahililo. (1 Timoteu 1:11; Yoano 14:9) Chikwo nawa, Yesu kalongesele atu yuma yize atamba kulinga mba awahilile. (Mateu 5:3-9; Luka 11:28) Chino chinasolola ngwo Yesu kapwile mukwa-kuwahilila, chipwe chifwa chenyi te che chakusoloka.

Hengwola tuyikuma tuli ha lusango wacho. Ha mashimbu jacho, ulite uka ni yiteli yize apwile nayo mwana mutangu?—Uputu. 18:18, 19; w10 5/1 13.

(Hepre. 12:16, 17; w03 10/15 28-29) Yika Yehova apwile ni kunyonga hali Yakomba ni Esau, nawa mumu liaka? (Mala. 1:2, 3) Yika kachi Esau alingile hanga akwate yiyulo yipema?
-
Lihule ngwe, ‘Kuchi hita poso munguhasa kusolola ngwami, kuwayila Yehova chili chuma chilemu ku mwono wami ha kusa mashimbu hanga ngulinge uwayilo wa mu usoko?’

Linangule vyakukunguluka chetu. Wana chihela chahakamwihi chakukungulukila.
Vyuma Muka Vyeji Kusolokanga haKukunguluka Chetu?
Vinjiho jaYehova veji kukungulukanga kavali muchalumingo. (Hepeleu 10:24, 25) Hakukunguluka kana tweji kukekesanga vyuma yahanjika Mbimbiliya nomu tunahase kuzachisa vyuma kana mukuyoya chetu.
Kakavulu vihande vyeji kupwanga hakukunguluka chetu vyeji kupwanga vyakushimutwila navatu vali mulizavu. Kukunguluka cheji kuputukanga nakukuma namwaso nakulomba.
Navaze kavapwa Vinjiho jaYehovako vanahase kupwa kukukunguluka chetu. Tweji kulanyanga vatu vosena vezenga nakukunguluka. Katweshi kufwetesako.
Kwanuka Kufwa chaYesu
Mwaka himwaka tweji kwanukanga kufwa chaYesu mukaye kosena. Tweji kulinga ngocho mwomwo tweji kukavangizanga lushimbi alwezele vaka-kumukavangiza ngwenyi: “Twalenuho lika kulinganga ngocho mungwanukilengaho ami.” (Luka 22:19)
Chilika kana nachikapwako cheka lyaChivali, March 26, 2013. Ngocho tuli nakumilomba mukapweko kuchilika kana. Vatu vosena vanahase kwiza kukukunguluka kanechi ngana muze chapwa kukunguluka chetu chosena. Katweshi kufwetesa vatuko.

KAPOSHI KAKUTALILA—MANGAZINI YAKULINANGULA September 2017
Eyi mangazini yili navihande vyakulinangula haOctober 23 nakuheta kuNovember 26, 2017.
Halwola lumwe, Yehova alijimbwile kuli Mose hakumulweza lijina lyenyi navilinga vyenyi. Hakumulweza vilinga vyenyi avangililile kuvuluka keke. Uno keke yapwa ika, kaha mwomwo ika mwatela kuyimona kupwa yayilemu?
Numba tuhu Mbimbiliya vayisonekele lyehi kushikulu, oloze nohalyapwa vatu vanakuyilanda chikuma chamokomoko nakwalumuka chamalimi, naviyulo, navaka-kole vaze kavasakile vayalumune mumalimi ekako.

Vilinga vyamaswekeza mufulumende vyapwa kuzachisa ngolo mujila yakuhenga mangana vanganyalileho. Vilinga vyamaswekeza vyafuma kushikulu. Chakutalilaho, muMbimbiliya mwatwama lushimbi lwakukanyisa vilinga vyamaswekeza hakusopa milonga. Echi chalumbununa nge kuhana maswekeza chaputukile vene kushikulu myaka yakuhambakana 3,500 kunyima. (Kulovoka 23:8) Maswekeza kawapwa kutambula majika kanwa kahako. Vilolo vamufulumende vaze vakwechi tato kana vanahase kwiva vyuma, nakuzachisa vyuma vize kavyeshi 
... (463 chars skipped) ... 
mende, navaka-kutunga jishimbi navachambamilonga vakiko vanakwazananga chikuma mumaswekeza. Achikekesenu hamijimbu yimwe yasolola ukalu kana.
AFRICA: Mumwaka wa 2013, vilolo vamufulumende vamuSouth Africa vakuheta ku 22,000 vavahanyine mulonga mwomwo yavilinga vyamaswekeza.
AMERICAS: Mumwaka wa 2012, muBrazil, vatu vakuheta ku 25 vavawanyine namulonga wakuzachisa jimbongo jafulumende jize vahanyinenga vatu mangana vavavwotele. Hali vaze vawanyine namulonga hapwile namukulwane wavilolo jatwamina 
... (463 chars skipped) ...
le ngwenyi: “Maswekeza analisale chikuma muEurope.” Ahanjikile nawa ngwenyi, “vatwamina vamapoliti kaveshi namuchima wakusaka kukumisa maswekezako.”
Vatu kaveshi kuhasa kukumisa maswekeza amufulumendeko. Susan Rose-Ackerman, uze alinangula chikuma hajishimbi jakukanyisa maswekeza, asonekele ngwenyi, “fulumende yatela kwalumunako jila yakulingilamo vyuma.” Numba tuhu chili nakusoloka nge vatu vanahono kukumisa maswekeza, oloze Mbimbiliya yasolola nge vyuma navikalumuka, kaha maswekeza nawakakuma.

Yamuvuluka ngwenyi, “lunga wa kulita ni mbunge yami.” (Yilinga 13:22) Profeta Daniele neye te ‘kakumuzanga chikolo’ kuli Yehova.—

mapwo eswe?

Mukanda wa Yombi 2:4, Satana yamba ngwenyi: “Mutu mecha yeswe ali nayo ha kulamwina mwono wenyi.” Ha chino, Satana kakalamikijile wika Yombi, alioze kambile ngwenyi atu eswe, malunga ni mapwo kali akwa-kuzo. Shina mutukeza kama kapwa ni umwe wanangana umuwika wa hashi heswe?
Achinyonga kama chize wanangana wa hashi heswe muuhasa kuyukisa atu. Musono atu anji kakumona lamba mumu kali yiswale, alioze atu akwo kali pichi. Alioze wanangana wa hashi heswe uze wanyingika yize atu anafupu muuhasa kukwasa atu eswe. Shina limwe tangwa atu makapwa ni umwe wanangana wapwa chocho?—Tanga Jeremia 10:23.
Chize ku shakulu, manguvulu a hano hashi keshi kuhasa kufunga atu kanawa chipi-chipi yiswale. Manguvulu akwo kali api chinji. (Chilumbununyi 4:1; 8:9) Alioze Zambi Mukwa-Ndungo Jeswe hanalakenya kuneha umwe wanangana uze muukasalakana ha mawanangana eswe. Mwanangana wamo makafunga kanawa atu.—Tanga Izaia 11:4; Daniele 2:44.
Yika Wanangana wa Zambi muukalinga?
Yehova Zambi hanasakula Mwanangana mupema, kali Mwanenyi, Yesu. (Luka 1:31-33) Muze Yesu apwile hano hashi iye te kakukwasa atu. Amu ali Mwanangana iye makanunga atu a ku mavungu eswe ni kuhwisa lamba lieswe.—Tanga Masamu 72:8, 12-14.
Shina eswe kakutayiza Yesu ngwe Mwanangana? Ka. Alioze Yehova kali mukwa-uhumboloji. (2 Petulu 3:9) Iye kanakwasa atu hanga atayize Yesu ngwe Mwanangana wo. Kwasala hakehe, Yesu makanongesa atu eswe api ni kuneha sambukila ni ukulungunga.—Tanga Mika 4:3, 4.

1. Sango jipema jika hali afu?
Yesu muze ahetele ku Mbetaniya hakamwihi ni Yerusaleme, yevwa ngwo sepa lienyi Lazaru hafwa te hikwapalika matangwa awana. Yesu yaya ku mafuka chimuwika ni Marta ni Maria, mandumbu ja mufu. Hazehene mbunga yiyikunguluka. Yena muhasa kumona chiseke cha Marta ni Maria muze Yesu ahindwishile Lazaru ku ufwe?
Marta te hananyingika sango jipema hakutwala kuli afu. Iye te kananyingika ngwo Yehova makahindwisa afu hanga akatwame kamuchali ni mwono hano hashi.
2. Afu kuchi 
... (442 chars skipped) ... 
kanyingikine nichimwe, kashika inferno ya kahia chamwenemwene yili longeso lia mahuza hali Zambi. Longeso lino ngwo Zambi kakwocha atu mu kahia iye keshi kulizanga.
3. Shina yetwe mutuhasa kuhanjika ni afu nyi?
Afu keshi kuhanjika chipwe kwivwa. (Masamu 115:17) Alioze amwe angelo api kakuzala mijimba ya atu waze hanafu hanga ahase kwonga atu. (2 Petulu 2:4) Yehova keshi kuzanga atu waze akufupa kuhanjika ni afu.
4. Iya makahinduka mu ufwe?

YIKA MBIMBILIYA YINAMBE
KUCHI MALIJI WANO MAHASA KUKUKWASA
Mbimbiliya muyihasa kukwaha kumbululo lipema lia yihula yilemu ya ku mwono.—Yishima 2:1-5.
Muyihasa kukwaha usongwelo ungunu ku mwono wa tangwa ha tangwa.—Masamu 119:105.
Nawa muyihasa kukwaha kutalatala chingunu cha kulutwe lia matangwa.—A-Roma 15:4.
CHAMWENEMWENE YETWE MUTUHASA KUTAYIZA YIZE MBIMBILIYA YINAMBE?
Ewa, mutuhasa kuyitayiza, ha mukunda wa yitela yitatu:
-
Kulita chaukomokeso. Mbimbiliya kanakayisoneka kuli amwe 40 a malunga waze te alisa, yinakalinga unji wa 1,600 ja miaka. Anji a kuli malunga jacho kakapwile hamuwika. Chipwe chocho, mukanda weswe walita, nawa uli ni chikuma chimuwika!
-
Sango jingunu. Akwa sango ja atu ha mashimbu akwo kakusweka uhenge wa atu jo. Alioze, akwa kusoneka Mbimbiliya te atu angunu mumu kanakasolola uhenge wo, ni wa vungu lio.—2 Sango ja Mianangana 36:15, 16; Masamu 51:1-4.
-
Uprofeto wa ushindakenyo. Muze Mbimbiliya yaprofetizalile unongeso wa mbonge yikulu ya Babilonia, kwapalikile unji wa 200 ja miaka mba yayinongesa. (Izaia 13:17-22) Yakasolwele wika chize te Babilonia mahasa kuyinongesa, alioze yiyisolola nawa jina lia yoze te mayinongesa!—Izaia 45:1-3.
Unji wa uprofeto ukwo wa mu Mbimbiliya hiunamanunuka kanawa mu yimako. Alioze hi yenayi ko te chatutamba kushimbwila mu Liji lia Zambi?—2 Petulu 1:21.

kunyingika umwenemwene hakutwala kuli Zambi.
kunyingika mumu liaka yuma yimwe yinalingiwa musono.

Unachinyingika nyi? Kwatwama unji wa yikungulwila ya Yela ja Yehova kuhiana 120,000, waze akulikungulwila mu unji wa Mazuwo a Wanangana kuhiana 60,000, hashi heswe. Hita mwaka kakutunga unji wa Mazuwo a Wanaganga 1,500 hanga atu alikungulwilemo. a

Mbimbiliya jacho kanakajifambwisa ha kukunguluka cha mambonge chize chinakalingiwa mu mbonge ya Benin ni Agbor Nigéria, chapwile ni mutwe ngwo, “Lihumikizenu.” Ha 8 Dezembro, 2023 ndumbu Archibong Ebiti yafambwisa Yisoneko ya Ngregu ya Akwa-Kristu mu limi lia Edo. Tunawahilila chinji hamwe ni mandumbu jetu waze akuhanjika limi lia Edo ni Esan, ha kufambwisa Mbimbiliya ya Yisoneko ya Chifuchi Chaha ya Yisoneko ya Ngregu ya akwa-Kristu mu malimi wano aali. Kumbululo lia mu Mbimbiliya
Ewa. Chipwe ngwe Mbimbiliya hi mukanda wa ciência ko, nihindu yuma yize yakwamba hakutwala ku ciência yalita. Tala yilweza yimwe yize yinasolola ngwo, Mbimbiliya ni ciência yalita ni chize manyonga ja atu waze apwile no ha mashimbu waze asonekene Mbimbiliya alisa.
Malilu ni hashi kapwile kutanga. (Uputukilo 1:1) Alioze, chize ku mashimbu a kunyima atu anji kakutayiza ngwo malilu ni hashi niumwe waatangile wakuhi, ene alitangile. A-Babilonia kapwile ni kutayiza ngwo ma

Shina mu Mbimbiliya muli tupalia hakutwala ku ciência?

Muli mikanda yinji yipema ya kuhengwola.
... (538 chars skipped) ... 
ngwolamo. Uli umwe ululikiso wa mu chisaji cha kusonekena, uze uli ni mikanda yinji, nawa uli washi ni kuhengwola yeswayo ize yena muhasa kufupa, ngwe yikuma hanji maliji hanji yisoneko.
Uli upema kuli alongi a Shikola ya Milimo ya Zambi. Nyi hiunalisonekesa ku shikola, yena muhasa kuhengwola kanawa mu utulikilo wa mikanda mu Zuwo lia Wanangana muze mululieka malongeso je. Ha 7 Agosto, 1993 mu Kiev, Ucrânia, kapapachishile mandumbu a malunga ni a mapwo 7,402 ha chimwe kukunguluka cha mambonge cha yifuchi yinji chambile ngwo, “Malongeso a Kuli Zambi.” Uno nihindu uchili upapachiso unene mu lusango wa tuvumbi twa Yehova ha mashimbu jetu. Waze apapachishile ha kukunguluka chacho ni haliapwila kakuchiuluka.
Mukachi ka waze apapachishile mwapwile ndumbu Volodymyr ni mukwo-pwo, Alla. Chino chapwile kukunguluka cho chitangu. Ha kunyonga ha unji wa atu kuheta ku 65,000 wa
... (384 chars skipped) ... 
ngila chinji Yehova ni kuwahilila.”
Oleksandr, umwe ndumbu wa ku Kiev, kapwile mukachi ka mandumbu a malunga ni a mapwo kuhiana 50 amu chikungulwila cho waze apapachishile ha kukunguluka chacho. Iye kaneuluka yize yalingiwile mu chihela chacho ni kwamba ngwenyi: “Nalilile mumu lia zango ni kulinunga chize mandumbu asolwele ha kukunguluka chacho. Changuhele shindakenyo ngwami nguli mu umwe usoko wa zango wa ku spiritu. Muze nakuya ku kukunguluka cha mambonge ha mashimbu wano chakungukwata ku mbun
... (384 chars skipped) ...
tesele, kashika haliapwila ngunalingi mulimo wa shimbu lieswe ha kupalika cha miaka 28. Ha miaka yino yeswe, Yehova kananungu ni kungukwasa.”
Ha mwaka 1993 kukunguluka cha mambonge cha yifuchi yinji chize chalingiwile mu Kiev chambile ngwo, “Malongeso a Kuli Zambi” chili chikalu kuchivulama. Chize ha shimbu liacho, akwa-kwambujola mu Ucrânia kwoka chinji. Musono, Yehova kananungu ni kuwahisa mandumbu jetu mu Ucrânia waze anambujola ni hamu ni kulihana kuli Zambi hanga apapachise.—Kutuhuka 32:26.

Ewa, mutuhasa kuyitayiza, ha mukunda wa yitela yaali:
-
Zambi kali ni ndundo ja kumanununa chilakenyo. Mu Mbimbiliya, Yehova Zambi mwe anavuluka wika ngwo “Mukwa-Ndundo-Jeswe,” mumu ndundo jenyi jishi kuhwa. (Usolwelo 15:3) Kashika iye wika uli ni uhashi wa kumanuna chilakenyo chenyi cha kwalumuna hashi hetu hanga hapeme. Ngwe chize Mbimbiliya yinambe, ‘kuli Zambi yuma yeswe muyihasa kupwa yashi.’—Mateu 19:26
... (49 chars skipped) ...
 Ngwe chino, Yehova kali ni “usona” wa kufunyisa mwono wa atu waze hanafu.—Yombi 14:14, 15.
Mbimbiliya nawa yinasolola ngwo Mwana wa Zambi, Yesu, kanakawuka mieji. Mumu liaka iye anakachilinga? Mumu iye te che akuzanga kulinga. (Marku 1:40, 41) Yesu ni ungunu weswe kanakembulula yitanga ya Tato ha kukwasa waze te anahono.—Yoano 14:9.
Kashika mutuhasa kupwa ni ushindakenyo ngwo Yehova ni Yesu kanazange kutukwasa hanga tupwe ni uwahililo kulutwe lia matangwa!—Masamu 72:12-14; 145:16; 2 Petulu 3:9.

VYUMA YAHANJIKA MBIMBILIYA
“Nakukapwa kusanguka.”—Vilinga 24:15, Visoneka vyaKaye Kakahya.
OMWO MUNAHASE KUNGANYALA
Kutachikiza muchano nachimivendejeka nge mwafwisa vatu mwazanga.—Wavaka-Kolinde 2, 1:3, 4.
Kamweshi kwivwa woma wakufwako.—WavaHepeleu 2:15.
Namupwa nalutalililo lwakukalimona cheka navatu mwazanga vaze vafwa.—Yowano 5:28, 29.
UNO TWATELA CHIKUPU KUFWELELA VYUMA YAHANJIKA MBIMBILIYA TAHI?
Eyo, mwomwo yavishina vino vitatu:
Kalunga apwa Tengi uze ahakako kuyoya. Mbimbiliya yavuluka Yehova Kalunga kupwa “kaselwoke wakuyoya.” (Samu 36:9; Vilinga 17:24, 25) Tengi uze ahanyine vyuma vyosena kuyoya akwechi ngolo jakuhana cheka kuyoya vatu vaze vafwa.
Kalunga asangwile vafu kushikulu. Mbimbiliya yavuluka vatu 8 vaze vasangwile kunyima. Havatu kana hapwile vanyike, navakulwane, mapwevo namalunga. Vamwe vafwile hatando yayindende kaha, oloze umwe apwile muchimbumbe makumbi awana.—Yowano 11:39-44.
Kalunga ali nakufwila kusangula cheka vafu. Yehova ahunga kufwa, ngachize achimona kupwa muka-kole. (Wavaka-Kolinde 1, 15:26) ‘Afwila’ kufumisako ou muka-kole kufwa, hakusangula vafu. Afwila kukasangula vaze vatwama muvishinganyeka vyenyi mangana vakayoye cheka hamavu.—Yopa 14:14, 15.
VYUMA MUKA MWATELA KUSHINGANYEKAHO?
Mwomwo ika tweji kushinakajiwanga nakufwa?
Mbimbiliya yakumbulula chihula kana hali KUPUTUKA 3:17-19 nahali WAVAKA-LOMA 5:12.

JW Library yakufunga mitwe ni tupitulu a Mbimbiliya waze wakwazulula. Achi chakukwasa chinji, chakutalilaho, kuwana kawashi yisoneko yize hi watanga.
Kaula uno usongwelo hakuzachisa Sango Hiunazulula Kulu:
Wana Sango Hiunazulula Kulu
Pola ha mbutau Sango hanga umone yisoneko ni mitwe ya pande yize watanganga haliapwila.
Jimuna Sango Hiunazulula Kulu
Pola ha mbutau Sango mba umone mikanda yize hiunatange. Pola ha mbutau Jimuna, hanga uyijimune yeswe.
Ayi yeswe kayifwambwishile mu Maio 2014 ni JW Library 1.4, yize yakukalakala ni Android 2.3 ni aplikativa jaha. Nyi yikuma yino kuwayimwene, kaula usongwelo uli mu “Putuka Kuzachisa JW Library— Android,” ha mutwe wakwamba ngwo Chiza Yikuma Yaha.

Saulu apwile mwangana wavaIsalele watete. Oloze Yehova amukanyine, nakusakula Ndavichi mangana amuswane. Tuwanenu vyuma vyavivulu vyakuvuluka Ndavichi. Haukweze wenyi, azakwile ndundulume, Ngolyate. Kufumaho achinyine Mwangana walwiso, Saulu. Jino Avingayile wamwaza amukanyishile kulinga chuma chauleya.
Kufumaho, natulinangula vyamwanaNdavichi, Solomone, uze aswanyine Ndavichi kupwa mwangana wavaIsalele. Ava vamyangana vavaIsalele vatatu vosena, umwe naumwe ayulile myaka 40. Hakufwa chaSolomone, Isalele vayipangile mumawangana avali, wangana wakunote nawakusulo.
Wangana wakunote wamiyachi 10 watwamine myaka 257 numbanyi vawenyeke kuli vaAsulya. Hahichile myaka 133, kaha wangana wakusulo wamiyachi yivali naukiko vauchikile. Jino vaIsalele vavatwalile muundungo kuMbavilone. Shikaho Chihanda CHAMUCHIWANA chili nakutala havyuma vyasolokele mumyaka 510, muze mwasolokele vyuma vyavivulu vyakukomwesa shimbu kanda yetu tupweko.

Hanjikenu hakulema chatwamaho. Kulisavala chalunga napwevo chapwa wana wakufuma kuli Kalunga, ngocho vatu vaze valimbata vakiko kaha vatela kulivwisa kuwaha wana kana. (Vishimo 5:18, 19) Mwatela kulweza vana venu ngwenu navakiko navakalivwisa kuwaha wana kanou halwola lwakutamo, chakuhona ukalu nakulizakamina chize cheji kufumanga hakulinga ujila.—WaChimoteu 1, 1:18, 19.

1. Kuchi upi waputukile?
Upi waputukile muze Satana ahanjikile mahuza atangu. Satana chitangu kapwile mungelo mungunu, alioze “iye kamanyine mu umwenemwene.” (Yoano 8:44) Iye yapwa ni nyonga lia kutambula uwayilo uze watela wika kuli Zambi. Satana yonga pwo mutangu, Eva, hanga amwononokene, ehuke kuli Zambi. Alama neye yembulula Eva ha kuhona kwononoka kuli Zambi. Yitanga yacho Alama anakalinga yinakamukokela lamba ni ufwe.
Muze Satana anakonga Eva hanga eche kwononokena kuli Zambi, hazehene iye
... (682 chars skipped) ... 
lo cha Zambi. (Chilumbununyi 7:29; 8:9) 6,000 a miaka ize yapalika mu yishima ya atu yinasolola ngwo yino yili ya umwenemwene. Mianangana ja atu keshi kuhasa kuhwisa jita, ungulungulu, uhenge, ni yikola.
Kuyula cha Zambi chinalituchika ni cha atu, mumu yoze matayiza kuyula cha Zambi mayuka. (Izaia 48:17, 18) Kwasala hakehe Yehova achize Mawanangana a hashi heswe. Atu waze akusakula Wanangana wa Zambi e makatwama hano hashi.—Izaia 11:9.
4. Yika mutulinga ha uhomboloji wa Zambi hali yetwe?
Satana 
... (682 chars skipped) ...
ho, amwe masepa ni asoko jetu mahasa kutukekuna hanji kulimika ni yetwe. (1 Petulu 4:3, 4) Kashika yetwe ndo tusakule. Shina yetwe mutulikata ni atu waze a zanga Zambi? Shina yetwe mutwononokena ku shimbi jenyi ja mana ni zango? Nyi yetwe mutulinga chocho, mutusolola ngwo Satana mukwa mahuza muze ambile ngwo niumwe mutu mahasa kulingila Zambi.
Zambi ha zango lienyi hali atu kanalakenya ngwo upi ni lamba mulikahwa. Waze akusolola ufulielo wo kuli Zambi, makawahilila ni mwono wa mutolo hano hashi.

Mutumona yize twatamba kulinga hanga tujikijile chinji ululikiso wa Yehova.

MUZE Yehova akuhana umwe mulimo kuli atu jenyi, iye kakushimbwila hanga mulimo wacho upwe wa kululieka kanawa. (1 Kori. 14:33) Ngwe chilweza, Zambi kanazange hanga sango jipema ajambujole hashi heswe. (Mateu 24:14) Yehova hanahane chiteli kuli Yesu cha kusongwela mulimo uno. Yesu neye kakusa shindakenyo hanga anyingike ngwenyi, mulimo wa

ngwo, kakujikijila ha ululikiso wa Yehova? Muze akutambula usongwelo, makulwana kakuutanga ni uhumikizo weswe ni kulinga yeswayo mahasa hanga aukaule. Ngwe chilwesa, kuchizako usongwelo uze akutambula hakutwala ku kulinga yihanda ha kukunguluka, kulemba kulutwe lia chikungulwila, ayo nawa kakutambula usongwelo hakutwala ku chize mafunga mapanga ja Kristu. Muze makulwana akukaula usongwelo uze akutambula mu ululikiso wa Yehova, mandumbu eswe mu chikungulwila kakulivwa ngwo Yehova kakwazanga ni kw

Lihendenunga kukulinga vyuma vyavipi. Wavaka-Kolinde 1, 6:9, 10
Nge twazanga Yehova, kaha katweshi kulinga vyuma vize ajindako.
Yehova kazanga twivenga, nakupenda, chipwe kunwa makanya namaundu akupendesako.
Kalunga ahunga ukenya, nakulifumisa majimo, nakulisavala chavatu vausonyi woumweko. Kasaka tupwenga nalizangamina chipwe kuliveta navakwetuko.

Mwono uka unazange kupwa nawo kulutwe lia matangwa? Atu eswe kanazange hanga ayo ene ni asoko jo apwe ni mwono upema, awahilile, atwame kanawa ni kupwa ni sambukila.
Alioze atu anji kakuyambashana nyi chamwenemwene lume kulutwe lia matangwa makapwa ni mwono wa mutapu au. Mumu liaka? Mumu ha mashimbu amwe, hano hashi hakulingiwa yuma susumuku yize yakwalumuna miono ya atu, kuneha uswale mu chifuchi ni kushiha atu anji. Chakutalilaho, musongo wa COVID-19 unashihi atu anji. Kashika, atu anji musono kakuyambashana hakutwala ku mwono wa kulutwe lia matangwa.
Mumu lia yize yinalingiwa musono, atu anji kanafupu yize muyasongwela hanga akapwe ni mwono upema kulutwe lia matangwa. Kashika, anji akuli ayo akufupa tahi hanji akwa-tufutafuta. Atu anji kakunyonga ngwe, kulilongesa chinji ni kupwa ni upite unji ye muyanehena uwahililo ku mwono. Akwo kakunyonga ngwo, katamba kupwa wika atu apema mba awahilile ku mwono.
Shina yuma yino muyihasa kukukwasa kupwa ni mwono upema kulutwe lia matangwa? Nyi twawana makumbululo a yihula yili mushi muchitukwasa.
Yika yize muyihasa kukunehena mwono upema kulutwe lia matangwa?
Shina kulilongesa chinji ni kupwa ni mbongo muyikukwasa kupwa ni mwono upema?
Shina kupwa mutu mupema muchikukwasa kupwa ni mwono upema kulutwe lia matangwa?
Yika muyikukwasa kupwa ni mwono upema kulutwe lia matangwa?
Kaposhi wa Kutalila yono makukwasa kuwana makumbululo a yihula yino.

1. Milimo muka vali nakulivwisa kuwaha vakweze?
TULI nakuyoyela mulwola lwakulipwila. Vatu vavavulu vakumafuchi osena vali nakwiza nakulemesa Yehova. (Kuso. 7:9, 10) Vakweze vavavulu vali nakulivwisa kuwaha hakukafwa vakwavo ‘vatambule meya akuyoya awana.’ (Kuso. 22:17) Ava vakweze veji kukafwa vatu valinangule Mbimbiliya nakupwa nachiyoyelo chamwaza. Kamilweza ngwenyi muzachisenga lwola lwenu lwosena mumulimo wakwambulula Wanganako. Oloze Yesu atunangula kulema chatwama hakutonda chatete Wangana. Nge namutondanga chatete Wangana, kaha namupwa nalwola lwaluvulu lwakuzachila Kalunga. Chakutalilaho, namupwa namilimo yayivulu yakusolol
... (6278 chars skipped) ...
la Yehovako? Twalenuho lika kuzamisa lufwelelo lwenu. Paulu alumbunwine vyuma alingile numba vamukisule kuli Yehova. Ambile ngwenyi: “Kachi nge namushinganyeka mweka, kaha Kalunga mwakamisolwela muchima kanou wakwoloka. Chipwe ngocho, heshoho haseteko tunahete mukuzovoloka chetu, tutwalenuho lika nakutambuka kanawa mujila yoyimwe.” (Fwili. 3:15, 16) Anukenu ngwenu Yehova amizanga, kaha nawa jindongi jenyi jinahase kumikafwa. Mulwezenu amikafwe musakule kanawa vyakulinga shimbu muchili muvakweze.
