Kusa Ulombo Waha
Kuli jila jaali ja kuselamo ulombo ha maliji.
Pola ha liji hanga ulisakule. Muhasa kuzachisa munwe hanga usakule maliji waze musa ulombo. Ha mifunda yize musa ulombo, pola ha mbutau ya ulombo; mba hi musakula ulombo hanga ufunjike sona.
Muhasa kuzachisa nawa sonekeso ha kufunjika ha maliji. Funjika maliji ngwe chize twakufunjika ha papilo. Muze muhwisa, mukusoloka hakehe yikuma yikwo. Yikuma yacho muyihasa kukukwasa kwalumuna hanji kuchiza ulombo.
Kwalumuna ulombo
Nyi muzanga kwalumuna ulombo uze wafunjika, pola ha chisoneko chacho; mba hi sakula ulombo weka. Nyi muzanga kuchiza ulombo, pola ha chisoneko chacho; mba hi pola mbutau Jimuna.
Ayi yeswe kayifwambwishile mu Novembro 2015 ni JW Library 1.6, yize yakukalakala ni Android 4.0 ni aplikativa jaha. Nyi yikuma yino kuwayimwene, kaula usongwelo uli mu “Putuka Kuzachisa JW Library—Android,” ha mutwe wakwamba ngwo Chiza Yikuma Yaha.

NSAÑU YAKAAYI KEJIMA
Indi nsakililu yakutwamba hichumanyi? Komana waneñaña hawubanji wakoñelañawu mwijina dansakililu? Komana njita, wubanji nimajika kanwa akoñaña antu aditenaña nawu amukalakelaña Nzambi yaneñeshaña yitoñojoka yeyi yayuma yaloña? Muloñadi nsakililu chiyinekalili nsulu yakukala kwakuvulu ñana?
Nsakililu yejima hiyikweti muloñaku, ilaña nsakililu yakutwamba hohu diyu yaletaña kukala kwejimiku. Yesu Kristu, muntu walemeshawu chikupu wemenañaku nsakililu, wamwekesheli nindi nsakili
... (2801 chars skipped) ... 
ashakami hanyima yakanyama wunakutiyisha woma. Kanyama wudi nanyitu yitanu nayiyedi ninseñu ikumi. (Chimwekeshu 17:1-4) Indi chivumbi wemenañakwinyi? Wukweti ñovu hadi “anyanta ankanu aheseki.” Wavwala jawusombu, wazatishaña insensi nawa waheta chikupu. Kubombelahu, ‘nadimbi nyunza yejima,’ muloña wakupanda kwindi. (Chimwekeshu 17:18; 18:12, 13, 23) Bayibolu yatukwashaña kwiluka netu iwu chivumbi hiizaza dansakililu yamukaayi kejima. Hemenañaku nsakililu yimu hohuku, ilaña wemenañaku nsakililu y
... (2801 chars skipped) ...
ujahañana kwadi kwikala kwosi nawa hikwadi kwikala kujilumuna muchidi wawantu kwaletaña makabi mukaayi kejimaku.”
Eña, mumatuña 235 aYinsahu jaYehova hiyashimwinaña hohu nshimbi yayililu yamuBayiboluku —ilaña ayizatishaña. Tunayikoleshi kwihula aYinsahu jaYehova kulonda ayikwashiku kudiza chuma chakeñañayi Nzambi kudenu kulonda mutweshi kudifukula kudi yena munjila yetejayi. Yinu diyi mpinji yimwatela kwila mwenimu. Bayi mulabaku. Kukuma kwansakililu yakutwamba kudi mukamwihi! —Zefwaniya 2:2, 3.

BAYIBOLU bayi neyi diyatachikili mafuku akunooka aya mpuhu ansakililu niakwituña anakwanakanawu mumaluña amavulu amukaayi makonuku. Hanu dinu, yidika yeniyi yafuma kudihi? Neyi wudi nawuswa wakusandujola mulayibulali, chatela kukuzañalesha hakumona chahosha nyikanda yikweti nsañu yahoshaña hamafuku akunooka ana aya mpuhu akwiluña diwashakamaña. Shinshikaku haniyi yakutalilahu yantesha.

 Mwaka Wawuha twambuka mumatuña ejima. EniRoma akunjikili idi ifuku kudi Janus, nzambi wayisu, mapitu, nawa wakusambila. Kakweji waJanuary wafuma kwijina daJanus, wadiña namahama ayedi—ihama dimu datala kumbidi nidikwawu datala kunyima.” Komana kwanakana Mwaka Wamuha kwafuma kuyisemwa yawusenji.

hanjeka hayidika yejima yanakanañawu mukaayi kejimaku. Hela chochu, mafuku akunooka ahamekaña antu hela mazanvu awantu hiyetejewa kudi Yehovaku. - Tanga Yoshuwa 6:1-25.
VaIsalele vajingulukile nganda yaYeliko mapapa kakavulu halikumbi lyamuchitanu naavali, kahechi chalifwana ngachilihi namulimo wakwambulula vali nakulinga Vinjiho jaYehova makumbi ano akukuminyina? (Yoshu. 6:15, 16; Isa. 60:22; Mateu 24:14; Koli. 1, 9:16)
Upolofweto vasonekele hali Yoshuwa 6:26 wateselemo ngachilihi hanyima yamyaka kafwe 500, kahechi chatunangula ika hamazu aYehova? (Vamya. 1, 16:34; Isa. 55:11)

Omu vaIsalele vapwile muundungo muMbavilone, lufwelelo lwavo valwesekele chikuma. Shatalake, Meshake, naAvete-nengo vavambilile mulilungu lyakakahya, oloze Kalunga avafumishilemo vavatonyi. Kufumaho, omu Mbavilone vayifungulwile kuli vaMete navaka-Peleja, Ndanyele vamumbilile muwina wavandumba, oloze Kalunga cheka amukingile hakusoka kutunwa twavandumba.
Kukuminyinako, mwangana wavaka-Peleja, Kuluse, asokwele vaIsalele. Vakindulukile kwimbo lyavo omu vene hahichile myaka 70 kufuma hakuvatwala muundungo muMbavilone. Chuma chimwe valivangile kulinga hakukinduluka kuYelusalema shina kuputuka kutunga tembele yaYehova. Oloze, nakushimbula chiku vaka-kole vazezekele mulimo wavo. Shikaho tembele vayikumishile hakuhita chamyaka 22 kufuma haze vakindulukile kuYelusalema.
Kaha nawa, natulinangula ungeji waEzela wakukinduluka kuYelusalema nakuwahisa tembele. Echi chapwile hanyima yamyaka 47 kufuma haze vakumishile tembele. Jino, omu hahichile myaka 13 kufuma haungeji waEzela, Nehemiya akafwile vatungulule jikembwe jaYelusalema jakupuzwojoka. Chihanda CHAMUCHITANU chili nakutala havyuma vyasolokele mumyaka 152 swi nakumyaka ino.

Mulifuci lyetu mwalisala vaixi kujimbango josena jiwana. Tunahase kuwana vaixi muKalungalweiji, muTulwiji, muVyoze na muVyana nawa. Kaha unyanga wavaixi unaliseze ngalila hingalila, kulitesa nakulisala kuze vatela kuyoyela nakusemunwina. Mungalila yaMuxiko vaixi muvatwama, oloze kwatwama membo cipwe kulihi kuze valisala cikuma, nge omu natwivwa kuhanjika camukulwane Alexandre Daniel, muka kulela vaixi kuze kungalila yaMuxiko. Mwata Alexandre Daniel, muka kulela vaixi nambulula jimbongi kwalisala vaixi mungalila yaMuxiko.

Visemi jenyi vamutondele makumbi atatu vejile nakumuwana mutembele ya Kalunga. Ali nakuhanjika nava kakunangula java Yuleya vya Kalunga. Maliya amwambile ngwenyi, “Ove mwanetu, ika unatulingila mangana? Twapwanga nakukutonda iso na yami na kulizakamina.” Yesu amukumbulwile ngwenyi, “Ika mwapwanga na kutondela? Ami ngwat

Yesu ikiye vene mulwilo wetu ou Kalunga ahanyine ulemu hakusanguka kufuma kuvafu. Kalunga ikiye mukakuhana kuyoya chachihya kuli vosena nawevwa lizu lyenyi, na kumufwelela, nakumelemesa ikiye. Ikiye azanga atwame nayetu mukuyoya chino tuli nacho na chize nawa chili nakwiza kulutwe cha haya myaka yosena.

Yetu kutushi kwehuka Yela ja Yehova akupapachisa waze akwecha kuya ku kukunguluka hanji kwecha kulitaka ni yetu. Kwamba umwenemwene, twakufupa atu jacho hanga twakwase kuzanga cheka yuma ya ku ufulielo.
Yetu kutushi kuhuma mutu chamuhumina muze malinga shili yinene. Alioze, nyi ngwe Chela cha Yehova yoze hanamupapachisa mapwa ni chako cha kulinga yuma yize Mbimbiliya yakukanjisa chakuhona kulikonyeka, mutu wacho kakupwa kusosolola mu chikungulwila hanji ngwetu, twakwecha kulikata nenyi. Mbimbiliya yakwamba ngwo: “Chizenu yono chingulungulu hakachi kenu.”—1 A-Korindu 5:13.
Mba nyi ngwe lunga yoze uli ni pwo ni ana Yela ja Yehova mamusosolola? Chipwe ngwe yuma ya ku ufulielo yize apwile ni kulinga hamuwika yakwalumuka, alioze yuma ya mu usoko yakununga chizechene. Usepa wa pwo ni mukwo-lunga hamuwika ni ana jo wakununga.
Atu waze ali akusosolola mahasa kuya ku kukunguluka chetu. Chikwo nawa, nyi mazanga mahasa kutambula yiyulo ya ku ufulielo kuli makulwana a mu chikungulwila. Chino chakulingiwa hanga aakwase kufuna cheka kuli Yehova. Atu waze hapwa kusosolola, muze akwecha yitanga ya luchisa ni kusolola ngwo kalikonyeka ni mbunge yeswe ni kuzanga kukaula shimbi ja mu Mbimbiliya, twakwatambula cheka mu chikungulwila.

“Yena wakwivwa kulemba, kuli yena akwa musunya eswe meza.”
Samu 65:2
“Fuliela Yehova ni mbunge ye yeswe; kanda ukajikijila ha malinjekela ja yena mwene. Ukamutayize mu yilinga ye yeswe mba iye makalulamisa majila je.”
Yishima 3:5, 6
“Mba apwe ni mwono wa mutolo, katamba kukunyingika yena Zambi umuwika wamwenemwene, ni Yesu Kristu, yoze yena watumine.”
“[Zambi] katwamine kusuku ni mweswe wa kuli yetu.”
“Yino ye nakununga ni kwita mu yilemba ngwami, zango lienu likalumbame hamwe ni chinyingi cha umwenemwene ni mana.”
“Kashika, nyi mutu umwe hakachi kenu keshi ni mana, anunge ni kwita kuli Zambi, mumu iye kakuhana kuli eswe ni mbunge yeswe, keshi kukumika, mamwahawo.”
“Kundamenu kuli Zambi, mba iye makundama kuli yenu. Pemesenu moko jenu, yenu yivulumunyi, tomesenu mbunge jenu, yenu akwa-mbunge jiali.”
“Mumu kuzanga Zambi chinalumbunuka chino: Ngwo, twononokenu shimbi jenyi, mumu, shimbi jenyi hi jikalu ko.”

Hengwola mu Mbimbiliya
Muhasa kufupa liji lia yikuma yize unatange mu Mbimbiliya.
Muze unatange Mbimbiliya, pola ha mbutau Fupa, hanga usoneke liji lize unafupu. Muze unasoneka, mumona maliji anji masoloka. Pola ha liji hanji mbutau Njila hanga umone yikuma yize awana.
Muhasa kukehesako yize unafupu. Versu Jitangu jinasolola versu jize kanji-kanji wakuhengwola. Versu Jeswe mujisoloka versu jinji kulita ni chize jalikaula mu Mbimbiliya. Ha yikuma hakusolola yikuma yinji yize yili ku uputukilo ni 
... (55 chars skipped) ... 
liji Waze Alifwa hanga akusolwele maliji analite ni waze wasoneka.
Hengwola mu Mukanda
Muhasa kuhengwola liji hanji chikuma ha mukanda uze unatange.
Muze unatange Mbimbiliya, pola ha mbutau Fupa, ni kuputuka kusoneka liji unafupu. Muze unasoneka, mumona maliji anji masoloka. Pola ha liji hanji mbutau Njila hanga umone yikuma yize awana.
Nyi wasoneka maliji anji, pola ha kasha ya Maliji Waze Alifwa hanga akusolwele maliji analite ni waze wasoneka.

Nyi hiunachiza Estudo Perspicaz

asa kuzachisa chihanda chino muze unatange Mbimbiliya ni mikanda yikwo.

Hakutonda vaka-kuzata milimo, vatu vamwe vanayinga kumauka aze vatachikiza ngwavo apwa akashishi. Chakutalilaho, mukulwane umwe wamilimo muPhilippines asonekelele kumutango waVinjiho jaYehova mulifuchi kana mangana Vinjiho vatonde milimo kukapani yenyi. Ambile ngwenyi vatu kana vapwa “vaka-kuzata nangolo, vakashishi, vaka-kulihana hamilimo.” Twatela kwalisa Yehova Kalunga mwomwo ikiye eji kutunangulanga ‘tuhunge kupihya, nakuzanga kuwaha.’—Amose 5:15.

Mumwaka wamuchiwana muwangana wenyi, Solomone mwaputuka kutunga tembele, kaha nahahita myaka yitanu nayivali nachimbwa chamwaka numba yikume. Yela ja Yehova keshi kulinga yiwanyino ya matangwa a kusemuka, mumu kananyingika ngwo Zambi keshi kutayiza yiwanyino yacho. Kwamba umwenemwene, Mbimbiliya kuyishi kuhanjika pundu nyi atu katamba kulinga yiwanyino yacho nyi ka. Alioze yakutukwasa kunyonga ha yikuma yimwe yize yakulingiwa muze atu analingi yiwanyino ya matangwa a kusemuka ni kunyingika nyonga lia Zambi ha yikuma yacho. Tala yikuma yiwana ya yiwanyino ya matangwa a kusemuka ni shimbi ja mu Mbimbiliya jize jinatale ha yikuma yacho.

Kangelo Ngavalyele vamutumine nakuya kuli mwanapwevo wamwaza, Maliya. Amulwezele ngwenyi mwakasema mwana uze mwakapwa mwangana haya myaka yosena. Ou kanyike Yesu, asemukilile mumulaka, muze vamuwanyine tufunga. Kaha, tanganyika atetekelele malunga vakuMusamuko swi nakuze kwapwile mwana. Natulinangula avalingishile vamone uze tanganyika, nomu Yesu vamuyowele hakufwila vamujihe.
Kufumaho, natuwana Yesu, omu apwile namyaka 12, anakushimutwila navalongeshi mutembele. Omu hahichile myaka 18, Yesu vamumbapachishile, nakuputuka mulimo wakwambulula wangana nakulongesa, uze amutumine Kalunga kwiza nakulinga hano hamavu. Hakusaka kumukafwa mulimo kana, Yesu atongwele malunga 12 nakuvapwisa vaposetolo jenyi.
Yesu alingile nawa vyuma vyakukomwesa vyavivulu. Alishile vatu makombakaji navaishi vavandende najimbolo jajindende. Okile vaveji nakusangula vafu. Kutwala muze, natulinangula vyuma vyavivulu vyasolokelele Yesu halikumbi lyakukumishilako mukuyoya chenyi, kaha nomu vamujihile. Yesu ambulwile kafwe myaka yitatu nachimbwa chamwaka, shikaho CHIHANDA 6 chinakutala havyuma vyasolokele hatando yakuzomboka chindende hamyaka 34.

Mukwa-Kwambujola Wanangana:

Shimbu kanda achiya mu malilu Yesu masoloka kulutwe lienu ni kwamba ngwenyi: “Muze spiritu yisandu muyikeza hali yenu, munukatambula ndundo mba kumunukapwa yela jami mu Yerusaleme, ni mu Yundeya mweswe, ni mu Samaria, ndo ku masongo a hashi.” (Yili. 1:8) Kuchi mulivwa?

... (397 chars skipped) ... 
Yoa. 15:20, 21) Muze munyonga ha maliji wano, kota mulihula nawa ngwe: ‘Kuchi munguhasa kwambujola Wanangana wa Zambi aku kananguhungumiona?’
Ni musono, twakulihula yihula yacho. Tuli Yela ja Yehova, kashika ni yetu tuli ni mulimo wa kwambujola sango ja Wanangana “ndo ku masongo a hashi” ni kuli “atu a ku mavungu eswe.” (Mateu 28:19, 20) Kuchi mutuhasa kulinga mulimo wacho chipwe muze anatuhunguniona?

... (397 chars skipped) ...
pu uze twakulingilamo mulimo wacho. Kupukuna ha yuma yacho, muchikolesa ujikijilo we hali Yehova ngwe, iye machinunga ni kusongwela chihanda cha ululikiso wenyi cha hano hashi.
Tunalemba hanga mukanda uno ukukwase kukolesa ujikijilo we hali Yehova ni ha ukwaso wa spiritu yenyi yisandu. Tunashimbwila ngwetu, chino muchikukwasa kutakama muze mununga ni kwambujola Wanangana wa Zambi ni kukwasa akwenu hanga akaalamwine.—Yili. 28:23; 1 Timo. 4:16.

Kwaleñelaña kwikala nawubwambu wakola. Hakupompa kwetu, bayi neyi twapompaña hamu nawakwetu itwadiluka nawu hohuku, ilaña nenzavu dawamabwambu itwadikunda nawu chikupu. Mpinji yikwawu twekalaña hamu nakuhema hampinji yakunooka. Indi kudikunda kwamuchidiwu kwatukwashaña ñahi? Kwatukwashaña kwiluka chakudilemesha wumu namukwawu nawa chumichi chakoleshaña mpanda ye

ña wubwambu wetu wakola. (Yishimu 17:17) Twamwekeshaña netu ‘twadihembaña nawakwetu’ kuhitila mukudikunda nawantu ejima muchipompelu chetu.—1 Akorinda 12:25, 26.

ACHISHINGANYEKE uli nakutambuka mujila oku kuli nakuhuhwa nyamanganda. Nakwilu kwosena jino wi. Miveso namikalateta hinayiputuka kuvuma, kaha navula yayinene hinayiza. Nauzangwisako oku uli nakutondatonda kwakuswama. Kaha hinaumona jino chisakila kukulo yajila. Muchisakila kana mwamwaza kaha nawa mwaumu. Nauwahilila chikupu kuswama muchisakila kana!

ona nomu vyalumbunukilako. Twatela kuhanjika kuli Yehova nganomu mwana mwahanjika naise uze azanga. Oloze twatela kuhanjika kanawa nakavumbi, nakulinyisa kaha nakuhanjika chakufuma kumuchima wetu. (Samu 62:8) Enga, chilongesa chaMbimbiliya chaha uka nakulomba chakufuma kumuchima, vyapwa vyavilemu mukulemesa Kalunga, kaha vinahase nawa kutukafwa tulilaminenga muzangi yaKalunga.

1. Ulo weji kulingisanga ngachilihi tanga kupwa yakuwahilila?
Mujimbu wamwaza wafuma kuli Yehova, Kalunga wakuwahilila, uze asaka tanga hitanga yipwenga yakuwahilila. (WaChimoteu 1, 1:11) Ikiye ahakileko ulo. Kulimbata kweseka najishimbi cheji kulingisanga tanga yipwenga yakuwahilila mwomwo yapwa hichihela chamwaza chakulelelamo vana.
Uno Kalunga amona ngachilihi ulo? Kalunga asaka valunga napwevo valimbata vatwamenga hamwe myaka yosena. Vaka-Kulishitu vatela kuvumbika jishimbi jamulifuchi lyavo
... (726 chars skipped) ... 
a mwosenako.—Tangenu Wavaka-Efwesu 4:31, 32; 5:22-25, 33; WaPetulu 1, 3:7.
3. Uno mwatela kujiha ulo wenu nge kamweshi nakutwama kanawa namuka-mahyenuko tahi?
Nge muli nakumona ukalu muulo wenu, kaha muvosena mwatela kufwila kulisolwela zangi umwe namukwavo. (Wavaka-Kolinde 1, 13:4, 5) Mazu aKalunga kawasolola nge kulihandununa chikiko cheji kukumisanga ukalu muuloko.—Tangenu Wavaka-Kolinde 1, 7:10-13.
4. Enu vana, uno Kalunga asaka vyuma muka kuli enu?
Yehova asaka mupwenga vakuwahilila. Amilwe
... (726 chars skipped) ...
ganyeka vyamwaza.—Tangenu Lushimbi lwamuchivali 6:4-7; Vishimo 22:6.
Vanyike veji kunganyalanga nge namuvakolezeza nakuvasangejeka. Oloze mwatela nawa kuvolola nakuvazangamisa. Kuvanangula mujila kana nachivakinga kuvilinga vyavipi vize vinahase kuvalingisa vahone kupwa vakuwahilila. (Vishimo 22:15) Oloze kamwatela kuvazangamisa naukenyako.—Tangenu Wavaka-Kolose 3:21.
Vinjiho jaYehova vasoneka mikanda yayivulu yakukafwa visemi navana vavo. Mikanda kana yazama haMbimbiliya.—Tangenu Samu 19:7, 11.

NDAVICHI aliwahishile nakuya nakulitaka halizavu lyamaswalale vaze vapwile nakuchina nakulishinjejeka. Vevwile woma kulwa jita, kaha vapwile nakuchina oku meso to mumutwe. Uno vyuma muka vyavevwishile woma? Ndavichi atela evwile omu vapwile nakuvulujokanga lijina lyamutu umwe. Amwene lunga wakutaluka nemana muchinema uze kanda amonengaho lyehi.
Lunga kana ikiye Ngolyate. Ndavichi amwene jino ovyo vyalingishile maswalale vevwenga woma. Lunga kana apwile wakutaluka chikuma kuhambakana vatu vosena.
... (5706 chars skipped) ... 
hiteko.” Saulu navatu jenyi valizuzukilile nawoma mwomwo yaNgolyate. Pamo valimbenjele hakulyesekesa kumutu wakutaluka, uze vakuminyinyinenga mumbunda chipwe hatulo yenyi hakuvemika nenyi hamwe. Vapwile nakushinganyeka omu chingazule kana mwavalindumuna mukapyapya kakandende. Oloze Ndavichi kapwile nakushinganyeka ngochoko. Ngana muze natumona, ikiye amwene ukalu kana mujila yeka. Ngocho alisuwile kuya nakulwa naNgolyate.—Samwele 1, 17:32.
Saulu akanyine ngwenyi: “Kaweshi kuhasa kuya nakulwa nau
... (5706 chars skipped) ...
zeza lufwelelo lwaNdavichi. Ngana mwaNdavichi, twatela kumona Yehova kupwa mutu nahenyi, Kalunga uze twatela kwivwa woma, uze eji kuyovolanga vatu jenyi. Lwola lumwe tunahase kumona ukalu tuli nawo nge unatoho chikuma, oloze twatela kwijiva ngwetu ukalu kana unapu waundende hakuwesekesa kungolo atwama najo Yehova. Nge natusakula kuzachila Yehova kupwa Kalunga ketu nakumufwelela ngana muze alingile Ndavichi, kaha katweshi kukevwa woma kala ukaluko. Kakweshi ukalu uze mwahona kufungulula Yehovako.

LIZU Honduras mulilimi lyaSpanish lyalumbununa “Kujiminyina.” Christopher Columbus azachishile lizu kana hakulumbununa meya amulifuchi kaneli mukalungalwiji waAtlantic. Vatu vamwe veji kwambanga ngwavo omu mukiko valukile lijina lifuchi lyaHonduras.
Vatu vamulifuchi lyaHonduras vamona kulyononona nakuzachila hamwe mutanga kupwa chachilemu. Chakutalilaho, valunga napwevo vakiko veji kukasanga vyuma vyakufwana nge—mwakuzachishila jimbongo jahazuvo chipwe jakufwetela vaka-shikola.
Vatu vamulifuchi 
... (29 chars skipped) ... 
a lilimi lyavaka-Europe nalilimi lyamulifuchi lyavo. Oloze vaka-lifuchi lyaHonduras vamwe hanga vakakachila kuchisemwa chavo chamulifuchi lyaHonduras. Kaha vaka-lifuchi lyaHonduras veka vakufwana nge vaGarituna vakakachila kuchisemwa chavo.
Vaka-muyachi waGarituna vafuma kuli vaka-Africa navaka-Carib India vaze vatwama haLitungu lyaSt. Vincent. Mumwaka kafwe 1797 vaka-muyachi waGarituna vejile havikuli vyaIslas de la Bahía (Bay Islands). Kaha kutwala muze vatungile kungenge yakalwiji Caribbean w
... (29 chars skipped) ...
 Kaha kufumaho, vaka-muyachi waGarituna valimwangile kuvihanda vyeka vyalifuchi lyaCentral naNorth America.
Vaka-muyachi waGarituna veji kulivwisanga kuwaha kukina jingoma. Vatu kana muchisemwa chavo veji kuvwalanga vyakuvwala vyamwaza, kuta vishimo, navyakulya vyakufwana nge ereba (chindanda chalupa).
Mulifuchi lyaHonduras mwatwama vikungulwilo vyaVinjiho jaYehova kafwe 400. Muvikungulwilo veji kuzachisanga Spanish, English, Garifuna, Lilimi lyatuveveve lyaHonduras, Mandarin Chinese, naMiskito.

Kulikata ni Mandumbu a Ufulielo Kuchi Chinatuyukisa?
Nichimwe chuma muchihasa kutukwika kuya ni kulikungulula ni mandumbu jetu. Yela ja Yehova chipwe ngwe kali ni yikatashi ya mwono, hanji kuhonga cha milimo ya tangwa ha tangwa, hindu kakusa tachi hanga alikungulule.
Kulikungulula chili chipema ku mwono wetu. Paulu hakuhanjika ni waze te apwile nikulikungulula no, yasoneka ngwenyi: “Tulitalenu umwe ni mukwo ni mukwo”. (A-Hepreu 10:24) Liji lino linalumbunuka ngwo “Hanga tulifunge,” chi
... (95 chars skipped) ... 
a akwetu. Yetwe mutuhasa kutwama kanawa ha kunyingika chize amwe asoko amu ufulielo anatwama kanawa chipwe mamona yitalingiso, hanji milonga yize ni yetwe tunamono.
Fupa masepa angunu. Mu yikungululo yetu, twakulitambula kanawa ngwe masepa aumwenemwene. Ha mashimbu akwo, twakuchiza amwe ma ola hanga tuhehe ni kusehejela hamuwika. Yika tunayuku hakupwa hamuwika? Tunalilongesa kulichichimieka umwe ni mukwo, chino chinakolesa zango lietu. Muze mandumbu jetu mapinda ni milonga, yetwe twakwakwasa han
... (95 chars skipped) ...
tu, tunasolola ngwo, ‘tunalifunga umwe ni mukwo.’—1 A-Korindu12:25, 26.
Tunakukolweza hanga usakule masepa waze analinga upale wa Zambi. Yena muhasa kuwana masepa mukachi ka Yela ja Yehova. Nyi vumbi lieswe, kanda wecha nichimwe chikukwike kulikungulula ni yetwe.
▪ Mumu liaka kulikungulula hamuwika ni yetwe chili chipema?
▪ Tangwa lika yena muzanga kuya ku chikungulwila chetu?

“Kwatenu masepa kuzachisa luheto lwakuzeneka kwoloka.”—LUKA 16:9.
MYASO: 32, 154
1, 2. Mwomwo ika vihutu navapwilangako lika mukaye kano?
MAKUMBI ano chiyoyelo chinakaluhwa. Vakweze vanakuchiwana kupwa chachikalu kuwana milimo. Ngocho vavavulu vanakuhaka kuyoya chavo muponde hakuya kumafuchi eka nakutonda mwakuyoyela. Uhutu unalisale chikuma namumafuchi muze mwatwama jimbongo naluheto. Kaha vatu vakuhutwa vali nakuhutwilako lika, vapichi nawa vali nakupichilako lika. Kweseka nakuhehwojola chakal
... (6728 chars skipped) ... 
afwe vakwetu. Kuli vandumbwetu vamwe vaze vatwama naluheto, oloze kavahasa kuzata mulimo washimbu yosena chipwe kuya nakuzachila kumafuchi ekako. Chipwe ngocho, veji kusuulukanga hakutachikiza ngwavo jimbongo veji kukundwizanga jeji kukafwanga vandumbwavo vaze vazata mulimo kana. (Vishi. 19:17) Mawana tweji kuhananga eji kukafwanga mulimo wakutunga mikanda nakukundwiza mulimo wakwambulula mumafuchi muze vatu vazanga vyuma vyakushipilitu oloze kavatwama najimbongo jajivuluko. Chakutalilaho, hamya
... (6728 chars skipped) ...
va hamavu navakawahilila chikuma hakwivwa mazu aYesu akwamba ngwenyi: “Twayenu, enu vanakisula kuli Tata, swanenu Wangana vamiwahishila kufuma kukwala chihela chakaye.”—Mateu 25:34.
^ par. 4 Yesu kasolwele nge vyuma vahanjikile hali uze kaselwa vyapwile vyamuchanoko. Mwomwo lizu lyachiHelase valumuna ngwavo “kukeshala” hali Luka 16:1 lyasolola nge uze kaselwa vamuvangijikilile. Oloze Yesu ashindakanyine havyuma alingile uze kaselwa hanyima yakumuvangijikila, keshi ovyo vyalingishile vamuhangeko.

Tulinangule jino omu chapwa kwononoka.
Shimbu kanda Yesu ezenga hano hamavu, apwile mwilu nakutwama naIse Yehova. Oloze Yesu apwile nawa navisemi jenyi hano hamavu. Majina avo vakivo Yosefwe naMaliya. Uno watachikiza vyuma vyasolo
... (247 chars skipped) ... 
uze cheji kupwanga kuli vakemba vosena. Omu mwahichile tukweji 9, Yesu asemukile. Aha jino hakiko Maliya naYosefwe vapwile visemi jaYesu vahano hamavu.
Jino omu Yesu apwile namyaka yakusemuka 12, alingile vyuma vimwe vyavilemu vize vyamusolwele nge azangile chikuma Ise Yehova. Chuma kana chasolokele omu Yesu natanga yenyi vayile ungeji kuYelusalema kuchilika chaPaseka. Jino omu vakumishile nakuputuka kuhiluka kwimbo lyavo, Maliya amwene ngwenyi Yesu wauchi. le tahi?— Apwile nakulinangula vyaIse Yehova. Azangile chikuma Yehova, kaha asakile kumwivwisa kuwaha. Twatela kuzata mulimo wakwambulula mukapachapacha, mwomwo luyando lwalunene lunapandama hakamwihi. (Vis 24:11, 12, 20) Tunahase kuzachisa eji jikati hakukafwa vatu valinangule Mazu aKalunga nakutachikiza keyala yetu. Eyi kati yili nachinjikizo chakutwala vatu hakeyala yetu ya Jw.org vatale vindiyo ya Mwomwo Ika Twatela Kulinangwila Mbimbiliya? Navawanaho nawa fwomu yakwihwilaho vavanangule Mbimbiliya chipwe kusaka kulinangula vyavivulu. Vatu vamwe kavasaka kutanga mikanda yetuko, oloze vasaka kuya hakeyala yetu yahainternet. Shikaho fwilenunga kuvahana eji jikati. Chipwe ngocho, kamwatela kuhana jikati kuvatu vakuhona kuwahililako.
Nge munawane vatu, kaha munahase kuvalweza mazu akufwana nge: “Nguli nachuma ngunakusaka kumihana. Eyi kati nayimitwala hakeyala yetu, haze munahase kututulula jivindiyo, navyuma vyakulisezaseza hawana wakanyombo.” (Yow 4:7) Munahase kumbata jikati jajivulu mangana muhane vatu vaze namuwananga.
